job_desc: Purpose   Overall Relevance for the Organization  Earlier this year  adidas decided to elevate the Data   Analytics function  moving from a tech service to a value oriented business function that actively and directly impacts adidas  P L The Data   Analytics function will include a Global Operations Advanced Analytics team  which will work hand in hand with the Global Operations organization on strategically relevant use cases that have the potential to deliver substantial value and redefine the way that the Global Operations business function operates  For example  the Global Operations Advanced Analytics team will build data science products to make supply chain faster  more efficient  and responsive through seamless demand   supply planning  optimized logistics and distribution  customized replenishment and automated workforce and production planning  The Data Scientists in the Global Operations Advanced Analytics team will support the development of data science methods for specific use cases across the full analytics lifecycle  from defining the business   data understanding to data preparation  modeling  evaluation  and deployment  Key Responsibilities Data science Support the development of data science methods for specific Global Operations use cases Continuously improve our methodologies and challenge the status quo  raising the standards for faster delivery Support improving and automating the data science platform and our machine learning pipeline to facilitate our data science activities and service use cases Data science network and storytelling Develop and nurture a data science network  both within and outside of adidas  to ensure that best practices and innovations are disseminated across the company Support presenting and promoting results and insights to adidas colleagues at all levels Stakeholder management Manage the relationships with the Global Operations project team  ensuring their views and requirements are captured Act as the ambassador for your use case  showcasing the key functionalities  driving adoption  and assuring operational excellence together with IT peersKey relationships Global Operations project teams SCM IT team Other teams within Data   Analytics  e g   Data assets  data platforms  data governance  market teams  Requisite Education and Experience   Minimum Qualifications Work experience University degree in the field of numeric statistical discipline or equivalent At least 4 years work experience  preferably in a data science or analytics environment Analytical experience in Supply chain planning and operations preferred Proven track record of working with senior stakeholders Hard skills Proficiency in data science methods  including supervised techniques  unsupervised techniques  recommender systems  Experience in developing and running simulation  optimization  and what if scenario planning tools to support decision making Proficiency in at least two of the standard data science programming languages  e g   Python  R  Java  Scala  Octave  Solid understanding of relational databases and NoSQL databases  Experience working with Databricks preferred Solid understanding of Machine Learning Operations  MLOps  required to scale and sustain use cases in a large and global corporation Familiarity with agile development methodology Soft skills Impeccable and to the point written and oral communication skills  English  Comfortable in presenting complex topics to stakeholders at various organizational levels Proven team player that can collaborate across functions and organizations Ability to develop influential and collaborative relationships High resilience and solution oriented attitudeAT ADIDAS WE HAVE A WINNING CULTURE  BUT TO WIN  PHYSICAL POWER IS NOT ENOUGH  JUST LIKE ATHLETES OUR EMPLOYEES NEED MENTAL STRENGTH IN THEIR GAME  WE FOSTER THE ATHLETE S MINDSET THROUGH A SET OF BEHAVIORS THAT WE WANT TO ENABLE AND DEVELOP IN OUR PEOPLE AND THAT ARE AT THE CORE OF OUR UNIQUE COMPANY CULTURE   THE 3CS  CONFIDENCE  COLLABORATION AND CREATIVITY  CONFIDENCE allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field  to reach higher  For us at adidas confidence means acknowledging that we don t have all the answers  But we are willing to take risks  we try new things  And if we fail  then this is part of our learning   it helps us improve  COLLABORATION  Every elite athlete relies on partners  coaches  teammates  and nutritionists  We  too  know that we are stronger together  Winning as one team takes open and candid dialogue  inclusiveness and trust in each other s abilities and talents  Being the best sports company in the world takes CREATIVITY  No great athlete succeeds by copying their predecessors  training plans and strategies  We have to be open to new ideas  explore  gain an edge and stand out  Only then can we succeed  ADIDAS CELEBRATES DIVERSITY  SUPPORTS INCLUSIVENESS AND ENCOURAGES INDIVIDUAL EXPRESSION IN OUR WORKPLACE  WE DO NOT TOLERATE THE HARASSMENT OR DISCRIMINATION TOWARD ANY OF OUR APPLICANTS OR EMPLOYEES  WE ARE AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER   JOB TITLE  Data Scientist BRAND  adidas LOCATION  Amsterdam TEAM  Data   Analytics STATE  NH COUNTRY REGION  NL CONTRACT TYPE  Full time NUMBER  378020 DATE  Feb 8  2022

As an a Data Analyst you will help us to make better use of the data we collect and make sure we deliver the best product as possible to our customers  Being a Data Analyst at Floryn means you are a healthy mix between an entrepreneur and data analyst  You should be interested in how the business operates  what makes the machine tick  but also how you can leverage technology to gain insight into this  You will work closely with the Development  Data  Risk  Marketing and Sales teams  We have a lot of interesting data on customer behaviour  marketing channels  sales and CRM  loan administration  company financials and machine learning models  We use Looker for our BI stack  so you can re use your definitions across reports  no more copy pasting SQL queries  We like simple visualisations and dashboards that can actually tell a story  What you ll be doing  Writing and automating data models in Looker and DBT  create clear definitions that can be used by business users in dashboards and reports  Build and manage dashboards  reports  scorecards  and other analytical services with visualizations that can tell a story  Collaborate across all our teams to understand business questions that data can answer  Build processes and standards that enable teams to become more self sufficient in creating their own reports  Raise questions of your own when you look at the data  we expect you to take initiative and come up with new insights about our business About Floryn  Floryn is one of the fastest growing fintech companies in the Netherlands  We aim to be the most responsible  scalable and customer friendly online lender in Europe  We ve lent out over   200 million since inception  2016  and have processed over   2 billion in transaction volume  We re located in a monumental building in the city centre of  s Hertogenbosch that also houses the Jheronimus Academy of Data Science  JADS   We are with around 50 people  split over Development  Data  Risk  Marketing and Sales  The technology that we build plays an essential role in everything we do  so we work with a fully in house development team  Building great stuff is what drives us and quality always comes first  Our technology has a major impact on businesses and people  Our organisation is flat and communication lines are short  so we can move quickly  We don t have code monkeys  Instead  we give you a problem and trust you will come up with an outstanding solution  We believe in sane working hours and long term solutions  instead of 70 hour work weeks with temporary workarounds  We do things our own way  we ship code every day and we take pride in our work  Skills  Expert SQL and data modelling skills Experience in business analytics and BI tools  Experience with Looker is a plus  willingness to learn is most important  Strong presentation skills  being able to author and present insights to the leadership team and internal teams Basic knowledge of statistics applied to business analytics  forecasting  segmentation  A B testing  predictive modeling  etc   Knowledge of database architecture  PostgreSQL  ETL data preparation tools  APIs  data science and machine learning technologies a plus Bachelor s degree in a quantitative field  Mathematics  Physics  Economics  Engineering or related areas   Master s degree a plus Perks  Good salary  pension contribution and 25 days paid time off  Daily  bourgondische  lunch at the office  Generous budget to develop yourself with books  courses and conferences  MacBook Pro and all high end gear that you need  Many team activities  from drinks to sporting events  Travel comfortably by first class rail or  0 19 km and parking  Work from home or from the office  whatever suits you

job_title: Two Assistant Professors in Geometric and Topological aspects of Data and Algorithms
job_desc: Are you a researcher in mathematics  Are you interested in geometry  topology  data science and algorithms  Please apply at Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam  VU   Location  Amsterdam FTE  0 8   1 Job description We are seeking a new colleague who is passionate about scientific research and education  Our department is looking for mathematicians with a proven expertise in geometric and topological aspects of data and algorithms  This topic can be interpreted in a wide sense  we are interested in analytical  statistical  probabilistic and combinatorial ideas to deepen our understanding of the relation between geometric and topological ideas on the one hand  and data science and its algorithms on the other hand  Concrete subject fields include stochastic geometry  topological  methods in  data analysis  geometric aspects of statistical learning  reconstruction of manifolds from data  equivariant deep neural networks  and applications of these  Other combinations of geometry topology and data algorithms are also a possibility   In this position  you develop their own research line  The position of Assistant Professor is initially a tenure track position for five years  After four years  based on transparent criteria  we will take a decision on the tenure  The preferred starting date is on or before September 1  2022   Applications from all groups currently under represented in academic posts are particularly encouraged  We are working to improve the present gender balance within the department  and particularly welcome applications from women Your duties you develop a research line in the broad area covering geometric and topological aspects of data and algorithms you complement existing research activities in the department you contribute to the teaching of the department  at both the undergraduate and graduate level you show academic leadership  nationally and internationally you participate in departmental activities and tasks  including writing grant proposals Requirements you have a PhD in mathematics  for example in the fields mentioned above  with a few years of postdoctoral experience you have a strong research record  as witnessed by excellent publications  original research projects  and an international network you are an inspiring lecturer you have good communication and execution skills you are fluent in English you have a basic teaching qualification   BKO    as required by Dutch universities  or equivalent  If not  you are willing to obtain this qualification What are we offering  A challenging position in a socially involved organisation  Based on full time employment  and depending on experience  the gross monthly salary ranges from  3807 to  5922 in accordance with Dutch academic salary scales 11  or 12  The job profile  Assistant professor or  Universitair docent   is based on the Dutch university job ranking system and the position is available for 0 8 1 0 FTE  For exceptional  experienced candidates an appointment as associate professor is a possibility   The appointment will initially be for 5 years  tenure track   After a satisfactory evaluation of the initial appointment  the contract will be extended indefinitely  Additionally  Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam offers excellent fringe benefits and various schemes and regulations to promote a good work life balance  such as  a maximum of 41 days of annual leave based on full time employment 8  holiday allowance and 8 3  end of year bonus contribution to commuting expenses good paid parental leave scheme child daycare facilities available on campusAbout Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam The ambition of Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is clear  to contribute to a better world through outstanding education and ground breaking research  We strive to be a university where personal development and commitment to society play a leading role  A university where people from different disciplines and backgrounds collaborate to achieve innovations and to generate new knowledge  Our teaching and research encompass the entire spectrum of academic endeavor   from the humanities  the social sciences and the natural sciences through to the life sciences and the medical sciences   Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is home to more than 26 000 students  We employ over 4 600 individuals  The VU campus is easily accessible and located in the heart of Amsterdam s Zuidas district  a truly inspiring environment for teaching and research  Diversity  We are an inclusive university community  Diversity is one of our most important values  We believe that engaging in international activities and welcoming students and staff from a wide variety of backgrounds enhances the quality of our education and research  We are always looking for people who can enrich our world with their own unique perspectives and experiences  The Faculty of Science  The Faculty of Science inspires researchers and students to find sustainable solutions for complex societal issues  From forest fires to big data  from obesity to medicines and from molecules to the moon  our teaching and research programmes cover the full spectrum of the natural sciences  We share knowledge and experience with leading research institutes and industries  both here in the Netherlands and abroad   Working at the Faculty of Science means working with students  PhD candidates and researchers  all with a clear focus on their field and a broad view of the world  We employ more than 1 250 staff members  and we are home to around 6 000 students The Department of Mathematics  The Department of Mathematics strives for excellence in research  The department balances pure mathematical research with mathematical research motivated by applications  Researchers in the department are on one hand active at a fundamental and theoretical level  and  on the other hand  work on applications with links to business  the sciences  and societal issues  The department has a strong international research staff with expertise in dynamical systems  geometry and algebra  as well as in stochastics  statistics  data analytics  probability    The department offers bachelor and master programmes in mathematics and in business analytics  In addition  the department provides mathematics courses for other programmes of the Faculty of Science  for programmes of other faculties in the university  and for the Amsterdam University College  Application Are you interested in this position  Please apply via the application button by 1 April 2022 and upload  a cover letter in which you describe your abilities and motivation  a research statement  a brief teaching statement  a curriculum vitae  a publication list  as well as the contact details of three potential referees Applications received by e mail will not be processed  Vacancy questions  If you have any questions regarding this vacancy  please contact   Name  Bob Rink  Position  Professor of Mathematics  E mail  b w rink vu nl

A lot of companies are drowning in data but starving for information  Are you excited about turning their data into actionable insights and unlocking their true potential  Then Rockfeather is the place to be Your role as a Data Science Consultant As a Data Science consultant  you guide our customers in their data driven journey  You help them unlock the true value of their data by sharpening their vision  educating them on data science  and support them in selecting the right solutions  As a real hands on consultant  you provide them with an implementation approach that you will execute later on  You are responsible for those projects from start to finish  Sometimes you will act as project lead  and you are the primary contact for your customer  You will serve as the leader of the pack of young and ambitious data scientists on these projects  You do not simply create what your customers ask for  but what they need  After all  it is your profession  Your most important tasks as a Data Science ConsultantYou advising clients on data science challenges  You provide and develop good management information for your customers  You develop tangible data science solutions  You work with various solutions such as Python  Azure Machine Learning  Alteryx  Dataiku  and other leading Data Science solutions  You creating content to inspire  potential  customers and colleagues   What does Rockfeather have to offer  Rockfeather gives you the complete freedom to continue your development as a Data Science specialist if you want to combine challenging assignments  work for ambitious companies  and help build a team in an entrepreneurial environment  Together we are passionate about the possibilities of data driven working and offering the best solution for our customers  Our teams with Data Analytics  Data Integration  Data Science  and Low code colleagues share their knowledge and network so that together we can realize impactful projects and unique solutions   We understand that the quality of your life determines the quality of your work  That is why we offer a complete package to take good care of yourself and your loved ones  Like every other company  we think we are unique  and we are  the place to be   The truth is that we are not for a lot of people  If you are looking for a company to build a career in  management  or if you like everything clean and crisp between 9 00 and 5 00  then look somewhere else At Rockfeather  we put craftsmanship first  We are passionate about what we do  If you want all the freedom and support to develop your skills to become the next  data guru   then Rockfeather is a perfect match  We also offer the opportunity to buy shares of the team you work in  the ultimate way to bring your entrepreneurship to the next level  What do you bring to the table  You have a bachelor s or master s degree in math  specialization in data science  You have a minimum of 3 years of data science experience  You have knowledge of data science  artificial intelligence  and machine learning  especially of  Classification Regression Deep learning neural networks Computer vision Advanced forecasting You have knowledge of Python and MLOps  You having knowledge of Azure Machine Learning  Alteryx  or Dataiku is a plus  You like to share knowledge with others  and you re a team player and networker  You are result driven and customer oriented because you own the process and consistently deliver top notch quality  You like to roll up your sleeves  and you have a talent for spotting new opportunities  You live in the Netherlands

Introductie Voor een opdrachtgever in Wijhe zoekt Greenmonkeys B V  een Data Specialist  m v   Over het bedrijf Hier zijn ze specialist in het ontwikkelen van bedrijfsspecifieke software producten  Kwaliteit en functionaliteit staan hierbij hoog in het vaandel  In verband met uitbreiding van het ICT team is er plaats voor een gemotiveerde Data Specialist  Over de functie De data wereld is voortdurend aan verandering onderhevig en jij als Data Specialist vindt het leuk om deze ontwikkelingen nauwlettend te volgen  Voor dit bedrijf zoeken we daarom een Data Specialist die data gaat prepareren en verrijken zodat jouw collega s uit het scrumteam deze data optimaal kan gebruiken voor onder andere dashboards en analyses  Jij bent de drijvende kracht achter de creatieve oplossingen die vraagstukken uit de dagelijkse bedrijfsvoering aanpakt  Hiervoor zoeken ze een creatieve  accurate en resultaatgerichte Data Specialist  Iemand met een positieve uitstraling  Je bent betrokken en loyaal en oprecht goed in wat je doet  Als geen ander wordt jij enthousiast van een cultuur van continu verbeteren en draag je daar graag zelf actief aan bij  Is jouw passie om data te vertalen naar innovatieve inzichten  Laat het ons weten en we vertellen je graag meer over deze interessante ICT baan in de buurt  Wat breng je mee Afgeronde HBO opleiding met een sterk technisch component Aantoonbare werkervaring in een soortgelijke functie Ervaring met SQL Server  Tableau  Power BI  Agile Goede communicatieve vaardigheden en analytisch In bezit van een gezonde dosis fascinatie voor data Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse taal in woord en geschrift Wat krijg je ervoor terug Passend salaris met een mooi arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket Persoonlijk ontwikkelingsplan Gemotiveerde collega s We nemen dan zo snel mogelijk contact met je op  Of voor meer specifieke informatie over deze ICT baan in de buurt  stuur ons via WhatsApp een berichtje  bel of mail ons  Harry Voss 06 23465519 Referentienummer 1145 Wat wij doen bij Greenmonkeys  Personeel werven  al vijftien jaar  Voor kleine  middelgrote en grote bedrijven  door heel Nederland  In die vijftien jaar was geen dag hetzelfde en geen mens gelijk  En precies dat maakt dat we met zoveel plezier ons werk doen en zullen blijven doen  Maar de laatste jaren zien we een grote toename in het aantal vacatures en dat geeft ons de mogelijkheid verder te kijken dan naar de inhoud van een baan alleen  De vraag naar een baan in de buurt neemt bijvoorbeeld toe  en ook daar willen we als Greenmonkeys aan meehelpen  We zullen geleidelijk aan alle vacatures van Nederland op ons platform samenbrengen  zodat werkgever en werknemer elkaar bij ons kunnen vinden en die baan in de buurt steeds dichterbij komt  Nieuwe kansen  waarbij iedereen wint  Een baan in de buurt levert onmiddellijk belangrijke voordelen voor jou op  Want met minder reistijd zorgen je voor meer vrije tijd  minder files en minder CO2 uitstoot  Ons onderweg  Ellenlange files  tochtige perrons of uitpuilende treinen  Stel je dan voor dat er bij jou in de buurt nét zo n leuke baan is  of misschien wel een betere  Op onze website staat een groot Als Business en Data analist bij het ministerie van Infrastructuur en Waterstaat te Den Haag zorg je ervoor dat de inzet van data een belangrijke pijler is onder onze Nederlandse infrastructuur  Je combineert inhoud en strategie met uitvoerende adviestaken op het gebied van data analyses  Als Business en Data analist leg je de juiste verbinding tussen relevante databronnen en de bestaande databehoefte  Daarbij combineer jij jouw inzichten in het datalandschap met geavanceerde tools  Jij voert deze veelzijdige functie uit bij de afdeling Administratieve Organisatie en Interne Controle  in het team Managementinformatie  Dit team maakt onderdeel uit van de directie Financiën en Inkoop  Wat ga je doen als business en data analist  Als Business en Data analist draag je bij aan de doelstelling van onze directie om de bedrijfsvoering en beleidsdirecties te ondersteunen in datagericht werken binnen de vele besluitvormingsprocessen  De directie gaat vaker en sneller advies geven op basis van verschillende databronnen  Met een data gedreven benadering verhoogt de directie de advieskwaliteit  In jouw rol als business en data analist lever je een actieve bijdrage aan ambitieuze projecten en opdrachten  Jij creëert de voorwaarden om data gedreven te kunnen werken  Dat doe je vanuit de vraag binnen de afdeling  Jij zorgt ervoor dat er inzichten en sturingsinformatie in de dashboards geplaatst worden  die bijdragen aan deze advieskwaliteit  Je werkt daarbij nauw samen met collega s van het team Management informatie  Samen met jouw teamgenoten laat je ook een frisse wind waaien door de wereld van control en financiële verantwoording en op het gebied van de informatiehuishouding  Je draagt bij aan technologische innovatie binnen de Rijksoverheid  Als business en data analist speel je een essentiële rol bij het ontsluiten van informatie en innoveren van financiële en controlerende functies  Daarmee zet je de trend voor alle medewerkers van onze directie  Hoe ziet je inwerkprogramma eruit  Om ervoor te zorgen dat jij snel jouw draai kunt vinden binnen ons team en in de werkzaamheden  werken wij met een buddy systeem  Elke dag starten wij met een dagstart met het team van business en data analisten om elkaar aan te kunnen versterken in werkzaamheden indien nodig  Je wordt binnen 6 maanden opgeleid tot een  junior  python developer  Functie eisen Kennis en ervaring je hebt een HBO diploma in de richting van IT of  technische  Bedrijfskunde  je hebt aantoonbare kennis van SQL en affiniteit met andere programmeertalen  je hebt ervaring als business en of data analist  je hebt ervaring met ERP systemen  financiële en inkoopprocessen is een pre  je spreekt en schrijft uitstekend Nederlands  Naast de eisen herken jezelf in de volgende eigenschappen je bent een teamspeler met een pro actieve houding  je bent goed in verbanden leggen tussen gegevens en vraagstukken en biedt daar ook een passende oplossing voor  je bent klantgericht en speelt in op de Het 6 koppige Data Science team van Netprofiler heeft versterking nodig  Wil jij graag werken als Data Science Consultant en jouw kennis toepassen in het online marketing domein  Kun en wil jij onze klanten zelfstandig en in teamverband ondersteunen bij het analyseren en verwerken van hun data om tot meer online groei te komen  Samen met 35 andere collega s zorgen we voor datagedreven groei voor al onze klanten vanuit goedbereikbare kantoorpanden in Amsterdam  Afwisselend met thuiswerken  dat dan wel tegenwoordig  Is je interesse gewekt  Lees dan verder Wat ga je doen Als Data Science Consultant ben je werkzaam binnen een snelgroeiende discipline binnen de LevelUp Group  Jij helpt onze klanten verder op het gebied van Data Science in brede zin van het woord  Je helpt onze klanten omgaan met de berg data die er beschikbaar is  of  die nog beschikbaar moet worden gemaakt  Maar  daarnaast kan je goed luisteren naar vragen van onze klanten  Vervolgens  kun je jouw creativiteit kwijt in het maken van de vertaalslag naar Machine Learning en Optimization modellen binnen het online marketing domein  Hierbij houd je rekening met de maturity van klanten en leg je hen duidelijk uit wat je aanpak is  Je werkt zoveel mogelijk op basis van experimenten en door je kritische houding ten opzichte van de datakwaliteit behoed je klanten voor overhaaste conclusies in de evaluaties Door proactief te communiceren over de activiteiten waarvoor je de verantwoordelijkheid hebt  weet je de verwachtingen en tevredenheid van onze klanten positief te beïnvloeden  Daarnaast lever je een actieve bijdrage aan discussies en kennissessies waarin je in staat bent om klanten of collega s een werkwijze aan te leren Verder heb je ook een rol binnen één van onze andere disciplines zodat je voldoende op de hoogte bent van de vragen die spelen in online marketing  Hierin mag je uiteraard je voorkeur aangeven  Denk aan  SEA  Marketplaces  Display etc Naast dat je dus ook aan de slag gaat met één van onze andere disciplines zijn dit de belangrijkste taken van deze functie   Je hebt kennis van Optimization technieken en bent creatief in het toepassen hiervan op klantvraagstukken  Je kunt dit helder uitleggen aan anderen waardoor je klanten duidelijk adviseert over het zo effectief mogelijk inzetten van hun online marketing  Denk dan aan adviezen over doelstellingen en budgetten voor volgend jaar of de inzet op bepaalde marketingkanalen  Data Science komt bij jou tot leven doordat je klanten helpt om op basis van hun data en behoeften Machine Learning in te zetten bij het maken van beslissingen  Je helpt bijvoorbeeld met het inschatten van de verkoop of van de kwaliteit van een lead    Je koppelt verschillende databronnen aan elkaar om analyses of dashboards mogelijk te maken  bijvoorbeeld CRM   Google Analytics en Google Ads data  Afhankelijk van de situatie pak je dit op middels Excel  Python of via Cloud Engines  Hierdoor geef je de klant bijvoorbeeld beter inzicht in de life time value van klanten geworven via bepaalde kanalen Wie zoeken we Je bent zelfstandig  maar werkt ook goed in teamverband  Je bent analytisch  nieuwsgierig aangelegd en HBO of WO afgestudeerd  Je hebt basale ervaring opgedaan met programmeren en hebt affiniteit met Machine Learning modellen of met wiskundige optimalisatie Verder herken jezelf hierin   Je bent resultaat gedreven  continu gericht op het realiseren van verbeteringen  nauwkeurig en kwantitatief sterk   Je hebt ervaring met het verwerken van grote hoeveelheden data tot bruikbare inzichten   Je hebt ervaring met programmeren in Python en kunt overweg met BigQuery   Je hebt kennis op het gebied van Machine Learning  praktische ervaring is een pre   Ervaringen met systemen als Google Analytics  Google Ads of Data Studio zijn ook een pre   Je stelt graag zelf doelstellingen en vind het prettig om hier verantwoordelijk voor te zijn   Je bent goed in het bijhouden van taken en deadlines én communiceert hier duidelijk over   Je hebt minstens 1 jaar werkervaring sinds je bent afgestudeerd   Je bent HBO of WO afgestudeerd in een technische discipline   Je hebt een uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal   Je bent 32 tot 40 uur per week beschikbaar Wie zijn wij LevelUp Group is een samensmelting van Online Marketingbureaus ClickValue en Netprofiler  Waar dingen samensmelten About us  Beat is one of the most exciting companies to ever come out of the ride hailing space  One city at a time  all across the globe we make transportation affordable  convenient  and safe for everyone  We also help hundreds of thousands of people earn extra income as drivers   Today we are the fastest growing ride hailing service in Latin America  But serving millions of rides every day pales in comparison to what lies ahead  Our plans for expansion are limitless  Our stellar engineering team operates across a number of European capitals where  right now  some of the world s most ambitious and talented engineers are changing how cities will move in the future   Beat is currently available in Greece  Peru  Chile  Colombia  Mexico and Argentina   About the team  The Dispatch Domain at Beat consists of 4 teams  i e  dispatch  matching  mapping  machine learning  and works remotely in a dynamic and agile culture  to build a full suite of dispatch features and strategies  Some of the team s responsibilities include finding the  best  match between the passenger and the driver  accurate and flexible geo services  and optimising the supply allocation   The dispatch squads also develop the platforms and data pipelines to monitor  analyze and flawlessly deliver these features that create world class experiences for our drivers and passengers  Everything in a state of the art machine learning enviroment   About the role  As a Dispatch Analyst  you dig into various data sources of dispatch and other entities and provide meaningful insights to support the Dispatch Domain in understanding the problems they are trying to solve and the values that new ideas may bring   Your impact will be truly global as you will work on projects that affect dispatch decisions globally  The ideal candidate is strong in their craft and is experienced in using data to create insights for stakeholders across various functions such as big data and machine learning engineers  back end developers  data analysts  product managers  designers  senior management and operational teams   What you need to have 3 years of proven experience in a quantitative or analytical role in creating software products and services Educational background in quantitative discipline or equivalent experience Hands on knowledge of SQL and databases querying Hands on experience in using leading data visualization tools  preferably Tableau  for producing engaging and useful insights Strong statistics background  area of focus hypothesis testing  Experience working on geodata analysis  geohashes  geo functions  geometries and route planning is a plus Knowledge of programming languages like Python R is a plus Excellent communication skills to be able to share compelling data driven narratives Ability to collaborate with individuals from varying backgrounds and skill sets What you ll be doing Own end to end data analysis including business interpretations and formulation of next steps Proactively contribute to strengthening our experimentation framework efforts  by providing your expertise on metrics  statistics and visualisation of results Analyse  visualise and communicate key insights and metrics internally to dispatch domain and to other parts of the business Use domain s internal or external data in order to identify areas of opportunity to drive value Support on creating a robust quality assessment procedure of the dispatch mapping data Develop  implement and maintain internal reports that improve our ability to proactively and reactively measure and act on our dispatch mapping strategy Support other team members  as well as be an advocate for a data driven approach within the organisation What s in it for you  Competitive full time salary Private Health Coverage on the Company s group program  Breakfast  high quality daily lunch on a very low cost  fruit and snacks all day long Flexible working hours  top Line tools  Spanish Lessons Working in a hyper growth environment  you will enjoy numerous learning and career development opportunities A great opportunity to grow and work with the most amazing people in the industry  Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals  autonomy and mentoring  which creates incredible opportunities  both for you and the company  As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce  Beat is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race  color  national origin  ethnicity  gender  disability  sexual orientation  gender identity  or religion

en selectieproces ziet er als volgt uit  Wanneer we een match zien op papier  nodigen we jou uit voor een eerste  online  gesprek  Is dat van beide kanten positief  Dan nemen we contact met je op voor detacheringsbureau bij de Rijksoverheid  vermeld dit dan in je brief  Het RIVM zet zich in om medewerkers in dienst te nemen die onder de doelgroep van de Wet banenafspraak vallen  Val je in deze doelgroep en sta je in het doelgroepenregister  Dan nodigen we ook jou uit om te reageren  Meer weten  Klik dan hier  Samen met jou kijken we of en hoe je eventueel invulling kunt geven aan deze functie  Bij het RIVM ben je welkom zoals je bent  Wij zijn ervan overtuigd dat diversiteit in een team de samenwerking en uitkomst sterker maken  Rijksinstituut voor Volksgezondheid en Milieu  RIVM  RIVM  deskundig  betrouwbaar en onafhankelijk Als Rijksinstituut voor Volksgezondheid en Milieu  RIVM  zijn we een deskundige  betrouwbare en onafhankelijke adviseur voor overheid  professionals en burgers  Ons doel  een gezonde bevolking en een duurzame  veilige en gezonde leefomgeving  We bewaken gezondheid  ziekten  de kwaliteit van de leefomgeving én het milieu  Daarvoor doen we onderzoek en we verzamelen kennis voor toegankelijke informatie en toepasbare adviezen  Het RIVM zorgt voor een goede geboortescreening  het bestrijden van infectieziekten en heeft een centrale rol bij het Rijksvaccinatieprogramma en de bevolkingsonderzoeken  We onderzoeken wat er nodig is voor goede zorg  een gezonde leefstijl  veilige producten en een veilige en gezonde leefomgeving  Ook dragen we bij aan het voorkomen  bestrijden en beheersen van incidenten en crises  Vanuit ons hoofdkantoor in Bilthoven en vanaf 2023 vanuit een prachtig nieuw gebouw op het Utrecht Science Park  werken we met ongeveer 2100 collega s aan al onze adviezen  rapporten  factsheets en publicaties  Daarbij laten we ons leiden door de vragen van vandaag én morgen  We doen ons werk midden in de maatschappij  Trots zijn we op onze organisatie waar iedereen welkom is  Als kennisinstituut van de overheid willen we een afspiegeling van de samenleving zijn  Naast talent  ervaring en motivatie maken ook aspecten van identiteit zoals leeftijd  geaardheid  culturele achtergrond of arbeidsbeperking  onze organisatie rijker  innovatiever én leuker  Met deze verschillende achtergronden  perspectieven en inzichten werken wij samen aan een nog beter resultaat  RIVM   De zorg voor morgen begint vandaag Ook benieuwd naar hoe anderen het werken bij het RIVM ervaren  Bekijk het op RIVM ers aan het woord   RIVM As a Data Scientist at Facebook  you will shape the future of people facing and business facing products we build across our entire family of applications  Facebook  Instagram  Messenger  WhatsApp  Oculus   By applying your technical skills  analytical mindset  and product intuition to one of the richest data sets in the world  you will help define the experiences we build for billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses around the world  You will collaborate on a wide array of product and business problems with a diverse set of cross functional partners across Product job_desc: Would you like to put your data analytics experience to use in an independent and responsible role at a fast growing tech scale up ChannelEngine is looking for an enthusiastic Data Analyst to work alongside our business and technical teams to create business value through data  We re working on some cool projects and need more talented people in the team to make our company goals a reality  We re building a data platform  migrating to Azure  and working on machine learning models  You ll be involved in all of this  as well as the day to day of helping convert all the useful e commerce data we have in our platform into digestible business intelligence to provide our stakeholders with the right insights to aid their decision making  What else will you be doing  Using business insight and technical knowledge to define  develop and deliver analytics solutions for stakeholders Liaising with external clients who request data or reporting solutions Communicating with business stakeholders to understand key metrics  analyse business and technical requirements then develop reporting   data applications Developing and maintaining ETL   ELT pipelines and data components to extend and optimise the ChannelEngine data platform Developing rich  intuitive automated dashboards Developing ad hoc reports and providing analytics services to support business decision making processes Searching and applying tools and or methodologies to foster data analytics best practices Documenting relevant code  business requirements and technical processes Providing support to the development of training materials and training activities related to the BI tools and applications Debugging issues  discrepancies and finding root causes  What you ll need Bachelor s degree in Maths  Data Science  or a similar field Minimum 4  years  experience as a developer or analyst within an analytics teams Minimum 2  years  experience in data modelling and SQL Ability to understand and analyse business processes and requirements Experience in dashboard development using PowerBI  Tableau  Looker or a similar tool Excellent communication skills in English  both written and verbal Active listening skills and a proactive approach Willingness to learn new things Availability to work 32 40 hours per week Eligibility to work in the Netherlands without visa sponsorship  Nice to have Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform experience Some Python skills  What can we offer you  Number 1  working at a company that is at the forefront of the world of e commerce and online marketplaces An interesting industry  marketplaces are booming  therefore our company is thriving This is a new role  You will have the opportunity and resources to implement your bright ideas together with the rest of the team We are in the process of building a data platform which brings plenty of interesting challenges   no two days are the same We have plenty of data and lots of demand to consume it State of the art tech  we work with the latest technologies  business models and tools  We re currently migrating to Azure Personal and professional development within a fast growing company with international plans and ambitions Work in our modern office next to Leiden Central Station  with views across the city or  of course  from home We want our colleagues to be happy and healthy  so there are quality chairs and sit stand desks to work at  as well as other ergonomic tools at your disposal Free healthy  and slightly less healthy  snacks  the widest selection of tea you ve ever seen  and exceptionally good coffee to keep you well fuelled throughout the day A very social and passionate team  We have lunch with colleagues  and we like to do fun activities together  About ChannelEngine ChannelEngine is a fast growing  e commerce SaaS solution  We help brands  retailers and wholesalers find millions of new customers by connecting them to the biggest marketplaces around the world Our story began in 2013 when it became undeniable that marketplaces were going to be one of the most critical components of the global e commerce industry  We saw an opportunity to make these powerful platforms available to every business  and now ChannelEngine offers a complete  user friendly  marketplace management suite with seamless integration  enabling businesses to expand their reach internationally  Our clients include Bugaboo  Hunkemöller  Brabantia  Bosch  JDE  and Reckitt  to name just a few ChannelEngine is growing at a rapid pace and currently covers channels in Europe  North  and Central America  the Middle East  and Asia Pacific  Our mission is to cover the globe  For this  we need to expand our teams with adventurous and ambitious people who want to shape the world of e commerce with us Are you up for the challenge  Don t hesitate to send us your application today Job Type  Full time

Solynta  based in Wageningen  the Netherlands  is a hybrid potato breeding company that  develops hybrid potato varieties with superior traits and performance at a rate much faster  than can be achieved with traditional breeding  The successful application of hybrid breeding  enables the use of Hybrid True Potato Seeds  HTPS   This revolution in breeding not only  allows for much faster product development  but also offers enormous logistical and  phytosanitary advantages  2500 kg of traditional seed tubers are replaced by 25 grams of  seed  Solynta is at the forefront of this innovation and  with its patented technology  platform  is ideally positioned to tap into the multi billion dollar global market for potato  genetics  www solynta com    To expand the research team  we are looking for a Digital Phenotyping Data Analyst   MSc  Full time  For our selections on plants and on tubers we are looking for possibilities to use digital  phenotyping methods for improving the data collection  You are the person that determines  the best way to phenotype different traits  and that calibrates digital phenotyping data with  actual plant measurements  You have experience in image analysis and machine learning   The goal of this position is to develop methods of digital phenotyping to a tool that breeders  can use to make selections KEY ACTIVITIES  RESPOSIBILITIES Image analysis of plants Processing of raw data into interpretable information Correlation of digital phenotyping data to plant traits Automatization of data processing pipelinesWE ASK An MSc in biosystems engineering or similar Image analysis and machine learning skills Experience in digital phenotyping techniques Insight in plant growth characteristics Interest to translate science into a usable product Ability to work closely together with diverse peopleWE OFFER    A one year employment contract with the prospect of permanent employment A competitive salary depending on work experience and education The opportunity to become part of an enthusiastic group of people working on one of the world s most promising innovations for improving food supply   Location  Wageningen  The Netherlands  If you are motivated to strengthen the potato hybrid breeding program at Solynta  we would  like to invite you to send a motivation letter and CV to recruitment solynta com   If you have any questions about the vacancy  please contact Julia Stockem  tel   31   0 6 51894987  This vacancy has no fixed end date

purpose As a highly digital focused company  citizenM strives to offer our guests the best digital experience amongst any hospitality company  We also want to free our hotel staff from any administrative tasks to allow them to provide our guests with the best non digital experience  In all our digital touchpoints for guests and staff data is used and created  This data needs to be understood  managed  loved and exploited   In this role you will help to understand our data flows  improve our data quality so that it can be used to create guest and business value  You will help projects and new initiatives to ensure the produced and consumed data is interfaced properly between systems and in compliance with our privacy policy  GDPR and other regulations  You will initiate and drive initiatives to measure and further improve data quality across our technology platforms  You will provide level 3 operational support to ensure that our data flows through our systems as smoothly as a salmon swimming up a pristine mountain stream   Your secret superpower is your ability to understand our data flows from the highest  most abstract level to the individual bits in our datastores  You love to query our databases to find the bits which are out of line and you are not scared to do some occasional scripting in our API gateway or create a proof of concept for a new micro service  Your best friends at citizenM are the BI team  they are everybody s best friend  and the Enterprise Architect   To achieve this we will seek to use the most recent data  analytical techniques  and appropriate technologies  We collaborate with teams across the organization to provide colleagues with reliable and actionable information through research  reporting  dashboards  and analytics  As an enabler to this you will provide a strong focus on data reliability and data reuse which will help lift our overall data quality  We value peer feedback  continuous learning  and blameless post mortems  We prefer proven technology and have built most of our data infrastructure on Azure  but we also care about finding the right tools for the job  so we invest in cutting edge technology when it s a good fit  Please attach a cover Letter including a brief introduction and your motivation   we will not consider your application without it   key responsibilities keep track of the data flowing through our systems and ensure these flows are properly documented  design and document data models for custom solutions where needed  analyse the data quality in citizenM systems and start and drive initiatives to improve the data quality  prepare data migration plans and execute them  design and drive the implementation of GDPR and other data governance processes across citizenM  design  test and implement strategies for matching  linking and merging customer data  raising the quality of data in our system via our data infrastructure modelling and testing  You will implement relevant KPIs to allow us to measure the improvements  qualifications   skills  previously worked in a technical role as developer  data engineer or similar  Bachelor s or Master s degree in a discipline relevant to the role  or equivalent work experience   hands on experience with technologies as Relational databases  JSON APIs and ETL processes  basic knowledge with software development in languages such as Python or dotNet  familiarity with Azure data services landscape and PowerBI is a plus  knows how to use ci cd methods tooling in the data domain is a plus  familiar with process documentation and tools such as Lucidchart  familiarity in Agile ways of working  strong communicator  self motivated  mature reasoning at a strategic level  able to take ownership and drive for results  able to work with a high level of attention to detail  fluent in English  citizenM is an affordable luxury hotel chain for mobile citizens of the world  With style that will knock your socks off  we offer citizens a real home from home  plus the world s fluffiest pillows  Our typical guest is a frequent traveler who is quality and design driven  and value conscious  We currently have hotels in the Netherlands  France  UK  Switzerland  Denmark  USA and Asia  with more to come soon  We are proud to put hospitality back into the hospitality industry  and have received numerous awards for our groundbreaking approach  We like to do things differently  This means our hotels are not traditional  and neither are our support offices  We re open minded  with kind hearts and global minds  citizenM loves diversity  We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from anyone   MS  LI Hybrid

in seconds  meaning customers can enter museums  zoos  theme parks and more simply by showing their smartphones  About time  right  We re dedicated to bringing simplicity to the world of travel and other  Be remarkable  Have fun  think creatively  and celebrate great moments together  Skip the line  Be fast  flexible  and smart  take responsibility and push forward  Life at Tiqets What you will do The Data Team is responsible for supporting the data needs of a large number of teams at Tiqets by helping them become more data driven in the way they operate  As a Data Analyst on the Data team  you will have the opportunity to work on a variety of interesting problems related to User Journey Analysis  A B Testing  Reporting  Marketing Campaign Optimization and much more   You will work hypothesis driven A B Testing Nice to have  experience with data modelling tools  such as dbt  Fluent in English Living in the Netherlands EU Perks   Benefits at Tiqets Young  energetic  international Als je dol bent om data om te zetten in overzichtelijke analyses zijn wij op zoek naar jou Als Trainee Data   Analytics bij MvH Media geniet je van veel vrijheid  Zo bepaal je zelf waar je werkt  is er veel ruimte voor eigen initiatieven en heb je de allerleukste collega s Dit doe jij Je bent net  of bijna  HBO of WO afgestudeerd en hebt een relevante opleiding gevolgd  Jij houdt van uitpluizen van een grote berg data  Een speld in een hooiberg vinden geeft je energie en die uitdaging ga je iedere keer weer graag aan  In dit traineeship geven wij jou de kans het vak in de praktijk te leren onder de vleugels van onze experts  Je weet als geen ander dat Cloud een belangrijk thema is waar Digital Analytics bijna niet meer omheen kan en daarmee neemt ook het belang van kennis over dit thema binnen onze organisatie toe  Je levert graag data en analyses aan van de hoogste kwaliteit en vind het leuk om de klant een toelichting te geven op de door jou gemaakte analyses Dit ben jij   Als analytische en conceptuele denker weet jij op een strategisch niveau gebruik te maken van verschillende databronnen   Google Cloud  Azure en AWS hebben geen geheimen meer voor je  Je weet hier prima de weg in te vinden en weet hier alle benodigde data uit te halen  Het is daarbij een pré als je  een aantal van  de volgende programmeertalen onder de knie hebt  Python  Node js   Javascript  R   Analyseren is jouw middle name  Jij begrijpt de relevantie van data analytics   De nieuwste trends en ontwikkelingen binnen het data landschap volg je op de voet   Met jouw sterke communicatieve vaardigheden  nuchterheid én een goede dosis humor weet jij onze klanten en prospects aan te spreken   Ambitie drijft jou  Je wilt de beste worden in het vakgebied en vindt het prettig om nauw samen te werken met mensen die dezelfde ambitie hebben  Je bent nooit uitgeleerd Dit zijn wij Wij zijn MvH Media  bestaan inmiddels ruim 10 jaar en zijn gek op online marketing  We zijn gevestigd in de buurt van Breda en Tilburg  We hebben inmiddels vijf keer een FD Gazellen Award als team weten te behalen en we staan in de Emerce top 100 beste bedrijven in de e business in de categorie Digital Marketing Bureau middelgroot  We zijn gedreven om elke dag het beste in onszelf naar boven te halen en zijn altijd op de hoogte van de laatste trends en ontwikkelingen binnen de e commerce wereld Wij bieden jou de mogelijkheden om kansen te pakken die aansluiten bij jouw persoonlijke ambities en groei  We geven ruimte om blogs  artikelen en whitepapers te schrijven  Wij snappen dat je het belangrijk vindt om jezelf verder te blijven ontwikkelen  Zo zijn er lezingen te volgen óf de mogelijkheid om zelf gastcolleges te geven aan hogescholen   universiteiten We willen blijven groeien en het zou gaaf zijn als jij daar je steentje aan bij zou willen dragen Als je ons team komt versterken krijg je naast een leuke baan in een informele organisatie  een mooi salaris en een hecht team het volgende   Ruimte voor creativiteit en om mee te denken hoe we nog beter kunnen worden   Wanneer het mooi weer is een heerlijke lunchplek op ons dakterras   Op vrijdagen een gezellige borrel of barbecue   Persoonlijk opleidingsbudget en ruimte om door te groeien  jij weet wat je nodig hebt  en wij willen samen het beste in je naar boven halen zodat je jezelf kan blijven ontwikkelen   Een thuiswerkbudget van   1500 om te zorgen dat het thuis ook aan niks ontbreekt en je fijn kan werken   Een laptop vanuit de organisatie  je hebt de keuze uit Windows of Apple   Bepaal zelf je werkdag  Je krijgt de ruimte om te bepalen waar je werkt  Je bent altijd welkom op kantoor  maar wanneer je thuis wilt werken  is dat ook prima  Je krijgt een reiskostenvergoeding voor de dagen die je op kantoor werkt   Superleuke bedrijfsuitjes en een mooi kerstpakket  We houden van gezelligheid  Zo gaan we naar de Vrienden van Amstel Live Hebben wij jou enthousiast gemaakt over de functie en ons bedrijf  Dan is het nu aan jou  Maak jezelf zichtbaar  En wie weet werk jij binnenkort aan de online zichtbaarheid van onze klanten Parttime uren  32 40 per weekSoort dienstverband  Voltijds Solynta  based in Wageningen  the Netherlands  is a hybrid potato breeding company that  develops hybrid potato varieties with superior traits and performance at a rate much faster  than can be achieved with traditional breeding  The successful application of hybrid breeding  enables the use of Hybrid True Potato Seeds  HTPS   This revolution in breeding not only  allows for much faster product development  but also offers enormous logistical and  phytosanitary advantages  2500 kg of traditional seed tubers are replaced by 25 grams of  seed  Solynta is at the forefront of this innovation and  with its patented technology  platform  is ideally positioned to tap into the multi billion dollar global market for potato  genetics  www solynta com    To expand the research team  we are looking for a Digital Phenotyping Data Analyst   MSc  Full time  For our selections on plants and on tubers we are looking for possibilities to use digital  phenotyping methods for improving the data collection  You are the person that determines  the best way to phenotype different traits  and that calibrates digital phenotyping data with  actual plant measurements  You have experience in image analysis and machine learning   The goal of this position is to develop methods of digital phenotyping to a tool that breeders  can use to make selections KEY ACTIVITIES  RESPOSIBILITIES Image analysis of plants Processing of raw data into interpretable information Correlation of digital phenotyping data to plant traits Automatization of data processing pipelinesWE ASK An MSc in biosystems engineering or similar Image analysis and machine learning skills Experience in digital phenotyping techniques Insight in plant growth characteristics Interest to translate science into a usable product Ability to work closely together with diverse peopleWE OFFER    A one year employment contract with the prospect of permanent employment A competitive salary depending on work experience and education The opportunity to become part of an enthusiastic group of people working on one of the world s most promising innovations for improving food supply   Location  Wageningen  The Netherlands  If you are motivated to strengthen the potato hybrid breeding program at Solynta  we would  like to invite you to send a motivation letter and CV to recruitment solynta com   If you have any questions about the vacancy  please contact Julia Stockem  tel   31   0 6 51894987  This vacancy has no fixed end date

te leggen aan anderen  Dan leren we je graag kennen Jouw profielJe bent een allround specialist binnen het data vakgebied met een sterk analytisch vermogen en iemand die graag inzichten deelt in een team  Je bent in staat om de vertaalslag te maken tussen fysieke datamodellen en logische datamodellen  Door je brede IT achtergrond  pro activiteit en goede communicatieve vaardigheden ben je in staat om  samen met andere IT specialisten  wijzigingen in de IT infrastructuur te plannen en uit te voeren in een voortdurend veranderende organisatie Wat je meeneemt Een afgeronde hbo wo opleiding en ruime  3  jaar  relevante ervaring als Data analystErvaring met datamodelleringstechnieken  logisch en technisch Kennis van data modelleren en het inrichten van datamarts Ervaring met Power BI en DAXKennis van SQLGoede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taalBij ons werk je  Afwisselend in ons kantoor in Arnhem en thuis  In verband met Covid 19 nu grotendeels vanuit huisIn flexibele fulltime basis  Extra vakantiedagen bijkopen kanIn een ambitieus en enthousiast teamWe brengen je verderAls Data Analyst ben je  samen met vier collega s van het team Data  Admin   Report  de backbone aan processing applications  de business en andere stakeholders  In eerste instantie ga je werken aan de voltooiing van onze data solution  Dit is het data platform waar de systemen van Transaction klanten middels Power BI  Je houdt hierbij de data solution up to date  Wij zorgen ervoor dat je wordt uitgedaagd en up to date blijft op je vakgebied met o a  kennissessies  Jij levert vanuit jouw kennis en ervaring een belangrijke bijdrage aan de informatievoorziening uit onze transactiedata Je nieuwe werkomgevingIedere dag maken wij miljoenen betalingen mogelijk  Daar zijn we trots op  Om dat te realiseren zijn we innovatief én betrouwbaar tegelijk  We sleutelen in de voorhoede aan de nieuwste technologie  maar staan ook met beide benen in de maatschappij  En dat zie je in je nieuwe werkomgeving  We zijn ambitieus  gericht op de toekomst  open en collegiaal  Vol vertrouwen in elkaar Reageer nuWord jij enthousiast van deze vacature  Dan ontvangen wij graag je cv en motivatie  Die stuur je naar ons via de solliciteerknop hieronder  Wacht niet te lang  De vacature sluit zodra we de juiste kandidaat hebben gevonden  Neem voor meer informatie contact op met Paulien Knuppel van Recruitment via 088 2289732  Als betaaldienstverlener zijn wij verplicht je te screenen  Daarom doorloop je een screeningsprocedure Soort dienstverband  Fulltime

weet data op een creatieve manier begrijpelijk te maken voor onze klant en voor jouw eigen collega s  In de uitkomsten van jouw data analyse zie jij dan ook kansen waar je naar handelt  Daarnaast heb We re looking for a data analyst to join our agile EU Growth squad  Our ideal candidate is adept at modeling complex data  uncovering patterns  and delivering data driven insights   In this role  you ll help provide the analytical firepower to help evolve our acquisition strategy and effective  efficient expansion to new EU markets  You ll collaborate with other data analysts and leverage the many internal tools we have developed to continuously measure  test  and optimize across all partners and platforms   If you love to take initiative and are a natural self starter who never backs down from a challenge this one s for you   Requirements 2  years of experience in a data analytics role  preferably within a fast growing consumer company Bachelor s degree in Mathematics  Statistics  Computer Science  or a related field Proficiency in SQL is essential  knowledge of statistical modeling is preferred Familiarity with digital marketing platforms is strongly preferred Hands on experience with modern data analytics stack  e g  Snowflake  dbt  Looker  and common MarTech tools  e g  Google Tag Manager  Google Analytics  Appsflyer  is a plus

purpose As a highly digital focused company  citizenM strives to offer our guests the best digital experience amongst any hospitality company  We also want to free our hotel staff from any administrative tasks to allow them to provide our guests with the best non digital experience  In all our digital touchpoints for guests and staff data is used and created  This data needs to be understood  managed  loved and exploited   In this role you will help to understand our data flows  improve our data quality so that it can be used to create guest and business value  You will help projects and new initiatives to ensure the produced and consumed data is interfaced properly between systems and in compliance with our privacy policy  GDPR and other regulations  You will initiate Tiqets is one of the fastest growing tech scale ups in the Netherlands  To keep it moving fast and making culture more accessible  we re hiring a Data Analyst to join us   Full time   Amsterdam Who are we   We re revolutionising the way people buy tickets to culture and attractions in cities all over the world  Our technology allows users to easily browse and book tickets to the best attractions in seconds  meaning customers can enter museums  zoos  theme parks and more simply by showing their smartphones  About time  right  We re dedicated to bringing simplicity to the world of travel and entertainment  If you want to join our team  working as a Data Analyst  send us your CV  We might be looking for YOU   Our values Be accessible  Help out  communicate honestly  and be there for each other  Be remarkable  Have fun  think creatively  and celebrate great moments together  Skip the line  Be fast  flexible  and smart  take responsibility and push forward  Life at Tiqets What you will do The Data Team is responsible for supporting the data needs of a large number of teams at Tiqets by helping them become more data driven in the way they operate  As a Data Analyst on the Data team  you will have the opportunity to work on a variety of interesting problems related to User Journey Analysis  A B Testing  Reporting  Marketing Campaign Optimization and much more   You will work closely together with Product Owners  Developers  Marketeers and Merchandising Specialists to uncover insights about the business  build new hypotheses and help Tiqets improve through an iterative process of testing and learning   If you are passionate about Data  enjoy working on challenging business problems in a fast moving environment and believe in the importance of teamwork then this could be the right opening for you   Responsibilities Dive deep into large business datasets to uncover valuable insights that can be turned into actionable hypotheses Build dashboards  reports and visualizations to allow others at the company to be able to ask the right data questions Work with Product Owners  Developers  Marketeers and Merchandising Specialists to determine and measure the right metrics in their respective domains Keep a close eye on the ever changing data challenges at Tiqets  and collaborate closely with Data Engineers  Data Scientists and other Data Analysts on the team to solve them Educate and empower others at the company to be more self reliant for their data needs Qualifications Technical or mathematical education at a Bachelor or Master level  3 5 years of experience in Data Analyst roles Strong SQL skills  Experience working with a modern Data Warehouse like Redshift  Snowflake or BigQuery Experience building reports on BI tools like Looker  Tableau or Qlikview  Experience with Web Analytics tools like Google Analytics  Mixpanel  Amplitude  etc  Excellent oral and written communication skills  Ability to clearly explain concepts and actionable insights Capacity to thrive in a startup scale up environment  adapt quickly  work independently and take ownership of your work Nice to have  prior experience in e commerce with a background in hypothesis driven A B Testing Nice to have  experience with data modelling tools  such as dbt  Fluent in English Living in the Netherlands EU Perks   Benefits at Tiqets Young  energetic  international work environment Bright  welcoming office located in the centre of Amsterdam Competitive salary and paid holiday leave Tiqets  learning academy  skill lab  group   individual learning Annual company getaway to undisclosed location Sports activities  free gym  running sessions  boot camp  football  climbing and moreFun  sociable company events in and out of the office Friday drinksSummer party 20  employee discount code to explore great museums venues worldwide Pension contribution and travel compensation  Everyone   employed at Tiqets will receive a monthly internet allowance for working from Als je dol bent om data om te zetten in overzichtelijke analyses zijn wij op zoek naar jou Als Trainee Data   Analytics bij MvH Media geniet je van veel vrijheid  Zo bepaal je zelf waar je werkt  is job_title: Sr Analyst/Consultant, Real World Data Solutions
job_desc: At Certara  we accelerate medicines to patients by partnering with life science innovators  In the past 6 years  over 90  of companies that received new drug approvals by the FDA used our software or services  Our integrated and proprietary end to end platform with biosimulation  regulatory science  and market access solutions combined with our strong team of scientists and subject matter experts enable our clients to have  informed decision making   reduced clinical trial burden higher R D productivity improved patient outcomes   increased patient access to medicines accelerated regulatory approval Certara is a global team that fosters and nurtures a diverse and inclusive culture  We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer  The collective sum of our individual differences  life experiences  knowledge  innovation  self expression  and unique capabilities and talent represents a significant part of our culture  our reputation and our achievement  Together with our partners  we use biosimulation and technology enabled services to transform drug discovery and development across all therapeutic areas and innovative therapies  Job Overview  This is a great opportunity for an early career Epidemiologist Pharmaco Epidemiologist Public Health professional to join a team of highly skilled epidemiologists  statisticians  health economists and consultants  The successful candidate will work closely with other senior scientific staff within the company  This position will allow the Senior Analyst  Epidemiologist to deepen his her skills by writing protocols for observational studies using a variety of healthcare databases  primary and secondary data collection  as well as providing scientific and other technical input during conception  conduct and delivery of various research projects  Main tasks   responsibilities Support RWDS project teams and be accountable to the project manager director for those projects Summarize and synthesize a wide range of medical and statistical information  including disease specific and pharmaceutical product research Develop an understanding of Regulatory HTA requirements for RWE  at least in the European and or North American context Support development of study documents  eg  protocols  analysis plans  reports  posters  manuscripts  under guidance from scientific team members and project manager s Liaise and manage processes with ethics committees  application committees and other relevant stakeholders to support acquisition of data for studies Interpret and communicate the results of clinical observational studies  health economic models  cost effectiveness and budget impact  and statistical analyses Undertake primary and secondary research initiatives including the retrieval and analysis of data  competitive product pipeline information  epidemiology trends  etc  according to needs of the project Participates in production of reports  presentations and publications  Critically analyzes data  presents results and provides internal data analysis  both qualitative and quantitative  and provides strategic thinking with respect to interpretation of results Interact with and foster relationships with existing network of scientific clinical payer experts and data providers Liaise with other consultants assigned to the project to ensure quality delivery of the project Support senior personnel with activities required for business development from time to time Align with and work within the framework of SOPs for data governance with respect to projects led Required Qualifications   Experience Minimum of Master s Degree in Epidemiology  Public Health  Medicine or other related field At least 2 years relevant post graduate work experience preferred Required Skills Professional proficiency in English  written and spoken Experience designing writing protocol for database or other observational studies Ability to work both independently and as part of the team Ability to effectively prioritize and manage multiple tasks and projects OTHER INFORMATION  This position can be office based or work from home in the UK  EU  Canada or USA  Number of Employees Supervised  None Percentage of Travel Required  0 10  travel Certara bases all employment related decision on merit  taking into consideration qualifications  skills  achievement  and performance  We treat all applicants and employees without regard to personal characteristics such as race  color  ethnicity  religion  sex  sexual orientation  age  nationality  marital status  pregnancy  physical or mental condition  genetic information  military service  or other characteristic protected by law   LI HM  LI Remote 2199

purpose As a highly digital focused company  citizenM strives to offer our guests the best digital experience amongst any hospitality company  We also want to free our hotel staff from any administrative tasks to allow them to provide our guests with the best non digital experience  In all our digital touchpoints for guests and staff data is used and created  This data needs to be understood  managed  loved and exploited   In this role you will help to understand our data flows  improve our data quality so that it can be used to create guest and business value  You will help projects and new initiatives to ensure the produced and consumed data is interfaced properly between systems and in compliance with our privacy policy  GDPR and other regulations  You will initiate and drive initiatives to measure and further improve data quality across our technology platforms  You will provide level 3 operational support to ensure that our data flows through our systems as smoothly as a salmon swimming up a pristine mountain stream   Your secret superpower is your ability to understand our data flows from the highest  most abstract level to the individual bits in our datastores  You love to query our databases to find the bits which are out of line and you are not scared to do some occasional scripting in our API gateway or create a proof of concept for a new micro service  Your best friends at citizenM are the BI team  they are everybody s best friend  and the Enterprise Architect   To achieve this we will seek to use the most recent data  analytical techniques  and appropriate technologies  We collaborate with teams across the organization to provide colleagues with reliable and actionable information through research  reporting  dashboards  and analytics  As an enabler to this you will provide a strong focus on data reliability and data reuse which will help lift our overall data quality  We value peer feedback  continuous learning  and blameless post mortems  We prefer proven technology and have built most of our data infrastructure on Azure  but we also care about finding the right tools for the job  so we invest in cutting edge technology when it s a good fit  Please attach a cover Letter including a brief introduction and your motivation   we will not consider your application without it   key responsibilities keep track of the data flowing through our systems and ensure these flows are properly documented  design and document data models for custom solutions where needed  analyse the data quality in citizenM systems and start and drive initiatives to improve the data quality  prepare data migration plans and execute them  design and drive the implementation of GDPR and other data governance processes across citizenM  design  test and implement strategies for matching  linking and merging customer data  raising the quality of data in our system via our data infrastructure modelling and testing  You will implement relevant KPIs to allow us to measure the improvements  qualifications   skills  previously worked in a technical role as developer  data engineer or similar  Bachelor s or Master s degree in a discipline relevant to the role  or equivalent work experience   hands on experience with technologies as Relational databases  JSON APIs and ETL processes  basic knowledge with software development in languages such as Python or dotNet  familiarity with Azure data services landscape and PowerBI is a plus  knows how to use ci cd methods tooling in the data domain is a plus  familiar with process documentation and tools such as Lucidchart  familiarity in Agile ways of working  strong communicator  self motivated  mature reasoning at a strategic level  able to take ownership and drive for results  able to work with a high level of attention to detail  fluent in English  citizenM is an affordable luxury hotel chain for mobile citizens of the world  With style that will knock your socks off  we offer citizens a real home from home  plus the world s fluffiest pillows  Our typical guest is a frequent traveler who is quality and design driven  and value conscious  We currently have hotels in the Netherlands  France  UK  Switzerland  Denmark  USA and Asia  with more to come soon  We are proud to put hospitality back into the hospitality industry  and have received numerous awards for our groundbreaking approach  We like to do things differently  This means our hotels are not traditional  and neither are our support offices  We re open minded  with kind hearts and global minds  citizenM loves diversity  We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from anyone   MS  LI Hybrid
