Imagine  That data is the greatest asset of an organization  Do you like to implement a Data Management framework in an international complex organization  Do you have an interest in financial products  In that case the Data Management Expert position within the Data Centre of Expertise  Data CoE  within the Wholesale   Rural domain of Rabobank has an interesting career to offer  Effective data management practices are required to improve the quality of data that is used for business purposes  regulatory and internal reporting and to meet various regulatory demands  e g  BCBS 239  and result in more efficient reporting processes  Making a difference The Data Management expert is responsible for the Data Management activities of client data and product data  Markets   Treasury  Financing  to assure compliancy with regulatory obligations  The team enables high level of data quality by delivery of expertise on the data model  data definitions  meta data   data lineage  reference data and data governance of which all in line with desired Rabobank standards   policies  Together with the current team members you will be involved in the implementation of these Rabobank standards  For several areas these activities need to be setup from the start  leveraging on the available experience and knowledge within the team  You act as a true data management ambassador and participate in WR and Group data management initiatives  You will be involved in the several squads and change initiatives in the Data   Connectivity area and in the data management challenges in other tribes  In your role you will facilitate and assist data stewards to implement robust processes and controls related controls  With each other Your key contacts are within Operations  Data Management Office and Finance   Risk next to many colleagues within the Client  Bankers and Data tribe and the data colleagues in the other two  product related  tribes within W R  The person we are looking for is able to influence and communicate on various levels  has an eye for detail whilst keeping the overall goal in mind  is naturally capable of motivating people and is quality driven  The Data Centre of Expertise   within the Data   Connectivity area of the Client  Bankers and Data Services Tribe   performs Data Management activities as a global service for client data and product data  The team consists of ambitious and enthusiastic professionals who share the drive to make Rabobank a data driven bank  Purpose Data   Connectivity Area  Deliver best in class client data services  data analytics and workflow solutions based on high quality data to provide our clients  bankers and data consumers a seamless client journey  Act as change enabler to contribute to the tribe s business objectives  enforcing a global business process and fully integrated E2E party lifecycle management  With you Bachelor degree with at least 3 years of experience or Master degree with at least 2 years of experience  Knowledge of working in an data driven environment  preferably in an international financial institution  Knowledge of translating data into valuable information  Experience with data management  Experience with implementing policies in complex organization is preferred  Understanding of continuous improvement management methodologies  Proven analytical capabilities  Excellent command of English  Dutch is preferred  Actively develop knowledge on the Wholesale   Rural organization as a whole  Actively interact within the Data   Connectivity area and across the other areas and tribes within W R to enhance Continuous Improvement  Actively develop own capabilities and share these within the Data   Connectivity area or broader to the Client  Banker and Data tribe  Competencies like  result driven  customer focus  collaboration  communication  flexibility  development oriented and proactive  Growing a better world together You ll already be aware that Rabobank is a financial services provider for more than 8 5 million customers in 40 countries  But did you know that we aim to contribute to real change with our  Growing a better world together  mission  We do so in countless ways  such as  Together with the World Wildlife Fund  we re helping to create a harmonious balance between nature and the agricultural sector in Brazil  Thanks to an agreement with the UN World Food Programme  more agricultural products are purchased from small farmers in Rwanda  Tanzania and Zambia  We aim to expand this platform to include one and a half million Terberg Business Mobility zoekt data gedreven data scientist   Wat ga je doen   Als Senior Data Scientist ben je binnen TerbergBusinessLease werkzaam op het gebied van data en analyse  Je ontwikkelt verklarende en voorspellende modellen voor onze afdelingen en klanten om daarmee hun business te versnellen en verbeteren  Realisatie vindt plaats met concrete machine learning modellen  die je bouwt in tools zoals Python  Hoe effectiever en efficiënter  hoe beter jij je werk doet   Voorspel welke ontwikkelingen de business nodig heeft om de doelstellingen effectiever en efficiënter te halen  Door het strategisch modelleren van data ontdek je de ontwikkelingen  Daarnaast ben je verantwoordelijk voor de exploitatie van nieuwe datasets en technieken  Denk aan machine learning en artificial intelligence  Als Senior Data Scientist maak jij het verschil als het gaat om  Verzamelen  beoordelen en prepareren van data sets   Ontwerpen  ontwikkelen  testen  inzetten en beheren van statistische voorspellingen en voorspellende modellen  Zo verbeter je de klantbediening en of commerciële klant markt benadering zowel effectief als efficiënt  Visualisatie van data inzichten  Beantwoorden van vervolgvragen over de werking en validatie van het resultaat  Vastleggen van de achtergrondinformatie en zorgen voor in beheer name zodat later de voorspelling verder ontwikkeld kan worden  Geven van trainingen en technisch inhoudelijke ondersteuning  Voorstellen van wijzigingen voor de klant  en marktbenadering en dienstverlening door de toepassingen van nieuwe datatechnieken  Denk aan machine learning en artificial intelligence  Onderzoeken wat de trends en ontwikkelingen zijn in de markt op het gebied van nieuwe datatechnieken  Het team  Je gaat werken in een leuk team met slimme gedreven mensen  Nauwe samenwerking en elkaar feedback geven maakt ons team continue beter  Elke dag leer je allerlei aspecten over leasing omdat je volop in contact staat met allerlei afdelingen   Wie ben je  Je hebt 3 tot 5 jaar relevante werkervaring  als data scientist  analist of onderzoeker  Je hebt ervaring met meerdere machine learning talen  R  Python  TensorFlow  of vergelijkbaar   Je bent vaardig in SQL en kent je weg in een database  Je bent bekend met een aantal machine learning algoritmes zoals random forests  logistische regressies  of neurale netwerken  Je bent sterk analytisch ingesteld  leergierig  en beschikt over een flinke dosis creativiteit  Je kunt goed samenwerken met een team  maar beschikt ook over genoeg zelfvertrouwen om zelfstandig te werken  Je bent communicatief vaardig  Je beheerst de Nederlandse taal  Wat vinden collega s  Duncan zegt het volgende over hoe hij het vindt om te werken bij Terberg Business Lease Group   Samen met het team bouwen aan de leasemaatschappij van de toekomst is zeer uitdagend  maar ontzettend tof om te doen   Wie zijn wij  Wij zijn Terberg Business Lease Group  Een ondernemend  van oudsher familiebedrijf met veel ervaring op het gebied van leasen  vervoer en mobiliteit  Met zo n 270 collega s houden we onze klanten mobiel op een slimme  innovatieve en duurzame manier  Wij bewegen mee met de ontwikkelingen in mobiliteit  en spelen in op de behoeften van onze opdrachtgevers  Onder de Terberg Business Lease Group vallen de labels Terberg Business Mobility  Justlease en Personal Car Lease   Ben je enthousiast   Ben jij Wat ga je doen als Data Scientist   Wil jij als Data Scientist een bijdrage leveren aan de energietransitie in Nederland  De energiemarkt verandert razendsnel en onze klanten lopen hierin voorop  Binnen de openstaande Data Scientist vacature zorg jij dat deze transitie van de grond komt   Ons doel is om een belangrijke bijdrage te leveren aan deze digitale transformatie  Om dit te realiseren ga jij als Data Scientist aan de slag met uitdagingen als predictive maintenance  vergroten van inzicht in energiebesparende maatregelen en klantgedrag  fraudedetectie  voorspellen van energieverbruik en of opwek en smart charging  elektrisch vervoer    Direct solliciteren op deze Data Scientist vacature   Als Data Scientist zul je datasets analyseren  complexe data inzichtelijk maken en bruikbare Machine Learning   AI modellen creëren  zodat je met data science toegevoegde waarde kan leveren door het verschaffen van nieuwe inzichten   Daarnaast krijg je met jouw overtuigingskracht en enthousiasme je omgeving mee op het gebied van data analytics  Als Data Scientist werk je daarbij veel samen met onze Data Engineers   Voornaam    Achternaam    Telefoonnummer  E mail    Versturen Wat breng je mee als Data Scientist  Je hebt minimaal 1 2 jaar werkervaring in data analyse  data mining  datakwaliteit en data management   HBO of WO afgeronde opleiding en relevante jaren ervaring  medior   senior niveau  in Wiskunde  Econometrie  Business Analytics  AI of een vergelijkbare opleiding  Of aantoonbaar door ervaring als Data Scientist gekregen   Je hebt kennis en ervaring met data modelleren zoals bijvoorbeeld SQL en met R en of Python   Je hebt kennis van data analytics tools  reporting  visualisatie en machine learning  Je kunt inzicht geven vanuit ruwe datastructuren en dat communiceren in begrijpbare taal   Je hebt goede analytische vaardigheden  Je bent niet bang om initiatief te nemen  Juiste communicatie skills  Beheersing Nederlands  B2 niveau    Engels  Wat kun je verwachten als Data Scientist bij Infiniot  Werken in een gemotiveerd team met ervaren professionals  De mogelijkheid om in het boeiende energiedomein het verschil te maken  Innovatieve opdrachten op het snijvlak van business en IT  Een organisatie met de ambitie om marktleider te worden op het gebied van IoT in de kritische infrastructuur   Ondernemende omgeving waar jouw persoonlijke ontwikkeling belangrijk is   Een carrièrepad in data science met daarin doelgerichte training en coaching   En natuurlijk aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden   We werken volgens onze cultuurwaarden  korte communicatielijnen  informeel  ruimte voor innovatie  passie voor techniek  flexibel  ondernemend en hechte samenwerking   Dit vertaalt zich natuurlijk in een prettige werksfeer in een snel veranderend energielandschap  Er liggen concrete uitdagingen  Reageer op de Data Science vacature   Acquisitie door wervingsbureaus wordt niet op prijs gesteld  wij werken met geselecteerde recruiters

job_desc: Junior Medior Data Analyst As our Data Analyst  you are responsible for making Helloprint a more data driven company where data is used to drive action in every team  every day  Depending on the team you will join  you will improve daily decision making and build automations using data  work on  and execute our Pricing strategies  or are responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio  In every team  we have a big amount of data at our fingertips with over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  300 production partners  and active business in 13 countries  At Helloprint we are looking for a Junior Medior Data Analyst for 3 teams  Data Analytics team  You make business results measurable and know how to get the insights needed to take action  You help team members of other departments to specify their goals and translate them into KPIs and data requirements  By using your knowledge of SQL  Python  and R to perform analyses and act based on that data  You are a strategic thinker  but not afraid of picking up the trash yourself either  You are proactive in identifying opportunities  starting projects with business teams across Helloprint  You are able to clearly communicate complex  technical topics in a way that s understandable and shows clear suggestions for the next actions  Pricing team As Helloprint s Pricing Data Analyst  you are responsible for the commercial execution of our pricing strategies  Based on your research and analyses you are responsible for the optimization of our pricing models  This will be a very challenging job  our business is in 13 countries and we have over 10 million unique products that require pricing  You know all the in s and out s of the pricing business and you will make sure our product offering always has the most competitive pricing  You have the vision  where do we go with our pricing strategies  How can we improve our margins  Supply Data team  As a Data Analyst within the Supply Data team  you re responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio together with the team  With over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  and 300 production partners  this is a huge amount of data  Retrieving  translating  and mapping data to our platform standard from any source or automation of data related processes using Python and or Alteryx is something you feel comfortable with based on your knowledge and skills  On top of taking you are given the responsibility to take the lead in certain projects from the get go given your experience  Does this make your eyes grow bigger  your hands start to itch  and do you feel the desire to make an impact and create fast growth  Look no more  This is the place for you  Are you ready for this  What we are looking for 1 2 years  Junior level  or 2 4 years  Medior level  of experience in data analytics  A Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science  Mathematics  Economics  Engineering  Operations Research  Statistics  Business or other related technical disciplines  Master s Degree is a plus   Excellent analytical skills  SQL   Python or R highly preferred   Advanced experience with Excel  For the role in the Data team  experience in website tracking  Google Analytics  Google Tag Manager  Segment  Snowplow or similar tools  and data orchestration tools  Airflow  dbt   Experience with Alteryx is a plus  Experience with working on strategic challenges and collaborating with management level stakeholders  A strong commercial mindset  you see opportunities and make sure we act on them  Experience in a scale up and e commerce setting is a plus   What we offer  A unique challenge at a fast growing European e commerce company  Smart and highly driven co workers who work on big challenges and a big dream  A fast paced learning curve and opportunities to grow and develop yourself in an environment where freedom and responsibility are central  A unique culture with 28 nationalities and with an average age of 30  Opportunities to grow  even into our Leadership Team  We don t look for age or background  if you are extremely good  you will grow quickly  The most beautiful office in Rotterdam  right on the Witte de Withstraat  the best street in Rotterdam  just 5 minutes from Rotterdam Central Station  Don t worry about food  that s on us  breakfast  lunch and dinner  Enough to keep you going all day  24 7 access to our HelloFit gym  The best hardware and software to work with  Who are we   Helloprint is a fast growing international e commerce company  ready to scale at large  With our mission to become Earth s largest platform for printed products  we constantly challenge the status quo and try to do things differently  Helloprint is headquartered in Rotterdam  the Netherland s best place to grow yourself  Together with our offices in Liverpool  Paris  Valencia  Lisbon and Manila  our 160  team from 28 nationalities is working in an entrepreneurial culture where freedom and responsibility are leading to high performance  Up for it   Our Helloprint talent acquisition process is straightforward with one important goal   knowing for sure that you and Helloprint are both up for it in the long run  Our culture is extremely important to us  so a fit between you and our culture is an absolute must  Check for yourself whether you think this would be a good match by reading our Helloprint Culture Book  When we receive your application and our first impression is positive  we will contact you and explain all the steps that will be part of our process  Enthusiastic  Give it your best shot and let us know why  Welcome to Helloprint  Design Yourself acquisition will not be appreciated  potential talent only please

Over RedForce  RedForce is een betrouwbare naam voor Linked Data in de Oracle Cloud  Zowel voor advies als projecten kan de klant bij ons terecht  Daarnaast hebben wij in eigen beheer ons softwareproduct Lidia ontwikkeld  Onze klanten zien de strategische voordelen van een moderne IT ondersteuning  En RedForce helpt ze bij het realiseren van die moderne IT  Ook als dit de transformatie naar een ander business model en het aanpassen van business processen betekent  Voor onze klanten is time to market steeds belangrijker  Wij bieden daarom kant en klare Cloud oplossingen gericht op specifieke klantgroepen   En we zetten ze zo op dat later aanpassen eenvoudig is  De door ons gebruikte omgevingen voldoen voor zaken als schaalbaarheid  beschikbaarheid en security aan de hoogste eisen   RedForce creëert op unieke wijze oplossingen voor onze klanten door gegevens uit diverse silo s te combineren  administratieve gegevens met geografische gegevens  IoT sensordata  gegevens uit documenten en gegevens van ketenpartners of de overheid  Dat doen we realtime en zonder replicatie  Daarmee leveren we onze klanten sneller en goedkoper een oplossing  We gebruiken voor de integratie Linked Data  RDF   Oracle Spatial and Graph en een eigen oplossing genaamd LIDIA  Dit is een GIS applicatie volledig gebaseerd op Linked Data  waarmee je Geo objecten kunt capturen en muteren  Daarnaast kun je Geo gegevens in een paar klikken koppelen aan allerlei typen andere data  financieel  onderhoud  documenten enz  De gecombineerde gegevens gebruiken we in te configureren applicaties en in portalen  We bieden onze klanten hiermee geïntegreerde maatwerk GUI s zoals geïntegreerde klantbeelden en smartphones tablet apps voor medewerkers in het veld   De Linked Data tester  We zoeken ervaren testers voor de opdrachten van Redforce bij klanten  Je werkt mee aan de realisatie van toekomstvaste oplossingen voor uitdagende problemen  gebruik makend van de nieuwste technologie van Oracle en uit de open source wereld  Als Linked Data tester heb je ervaring met SPARQL en GeoSPARQL  Zoals je ziet gebruiken wij veel verschillende methoden en technologieën  er is bij ons dus veel te leren  En omdat wij steeds met de nieuwste technologieën bezig blijven ben je bij ons nooit uitgeleerd  Heel belangrijk is daarom dat je leergierig bent  houd van pionieren en je altijd het beste van jezelf wilt geven  Wij zijn bereid het beste van onszelf aan jou te geven  in opleiding  in uitdagende projecten en in samenwerking met ervaren collega s   Ben je geïnteresseerd  maar heb je nog inhoudelijke vragen  bel dan naar Peter van Bentum  telefoon 06 10273666  Voor overige vragen Stefan van der Mark  telefoon 06 41678002  Of solliciteer direct  stuur dan je CV en motivatie naar stefan vandermark dpa nl

Als Data Analist werk je samen met het team indirect aan een optimale gastbeleving bij het grootste horeca familiebedrijf van Nederland  Een mooie manier om jezelf te ontwikkelen bij een familiebedrijf dat iedereen kent  Werken bij Van der Valk betekent werken vol toewijding en elke dag het beste uit jezelf halen  Ondernemen zit in ons DNA en mede daardoor blijven we groeien  Je maakt deel uit van het datateam van Van der Valk International en werkt nauw samen met onze collega s in Duitsland  Jouw standplaats is dan ook Tiel maar je reist regelmatig af naar onze locatie Moers in Duistland  Data Analist Als Data Analist is er bij Van der Valk meer mogelijk dan je denkt  Tijdens je inwerkperiode doorloop je alle facetten van jouw afdeling  Je grijpt je kans om jouw passie voor data  nieuwe technologieën en het ontwerp en de ontwikkeling van nieuwe data gedreven oplossing tot uiting te laten komen  Dagelijks haal jij het beste uit jezelf en je collega s  Na de inwerkperiode kun je de dagelijkse werkzaamheden die bij de functie horen zelfstandig uitvoeren  Je weet daarnaast als geen ander wat gastvrijheid is en kunt dit goed overbrengen op alle collega s  Bij ons luidt de slogan namelijk   wij zeggen geen nee  maar bieden een alternatief   In de rol van Data Analist ben je verantwoordelijk voor de voorbereiding en consolidatie van gegevens uit interne en externe gegevensbronnen en voor de datavisualisatie met Power BI  Je rapporteert aan de Senior Data Analist en stakeholders  Je werkt nauw samen met het management en andere afdelingen en hebt hierbij de focus op onze Duitse organisatie  Je verliest hierbij de doelstellingen nooit uit het oog  En  Je verzamelt informatie  en rapportagebehoeften van interne stakeholders  met focus op onze Duitse organisatie  Je optimaliseert informatieverwerking en  voorziening over de gehele keten  Je koppelt bedrijfsapplicaties en andere gegevensbronnen aan het datawarehouse  Je stelt de datadictionary en bijbehorende  definities op  Je ontwerpt en beheert het datamodel  Je ontwikkelt datasets met MS SQL en Power Query  Je richt Power BI gegevensstromen in door verbinding te maken met diverse gegevensbronnen  o a  datawarehouse  API  Sharepoint   Je ontwerpt en ontwikkelt Power BI rapportages  Je ontwerpt en richt Flows in  in Power Automate  Jouw profiel Je zit vol met energie en vindt het leuk om met het team te zorgen voor een goed draaiende afdeling  Je bent gemotiveerd en enthousiast en legt de nadruk op tevredenheid van jouw stakeholders  Je hebt zelfkennis  bent kritisch en je bent altijd bezig met wat beter kan  Gastvrijheid betekent voor jou nét die stap extra zetten om er indirect voor te zorgen dat onze gasten het hotel verlaten met een glimlach  En  Minimaal een afgeronde hbo opleiding in  bedrijfs informatica  datawetenschap  data analyse of soortgelijk  Minimaal 3 jaar ervaring met het analyseren en voorbereiden van complexe gegevens ter ondersteuning van belangrijke zakelijke beslissingen  Je bent sterk in gegevensanalyse  Power BI  Excel  enz   Je hebt kennis van SQL en programmeertalen  SQL  DAX  M  Power Query    Je hebt sterke communicatieve vaardigheden en toont initiatief  Je brengt technische kennis mee en hebt een zeer analytisch denkvermogen  Je kunt goed zelfstandig werken  maar bent ook een teamplayer  Je spreekt vloeiend Nederlands  Engels en bij voorkeur ook Duits  Wij bieden Je kunt je ontwikkelen in een veelzijdige functie  Wij zijn een groeiende organisatie met innovatie als drijfveer  Ondernemen zit in ons DNA en mede daardoor blijven we groeien en innoveren en bieden wij volop kansen  Je hoeft ze alleen nog maar te pakken  Je ontvangt een marktconform salaris  Verder heb je een functie binnen een familiebedrijf met een gezellige werksfeer waar teamwork de basis van het succes is  Je ontvangt een family and friends membercard die jou korting geeft op o a  overnachtingen en in onze restaurants  Er is mogelijkheid tot bedrijfsfitness tegen een kleine vergoeding  Wie zijn wij  Van der Valk International is een bv waartoe een aantal prachtige hotels behoren  Onder VDVI vallen 6 hotels in Nederland  9 hotels in Duitsland  1 hotel in België  1 hotel in Spanje en 1 hotel op Bonaire  Wij zijn daarnaast ook aanwezig op de Duitse markt met twee vakantieoorden  twee skihallen  een waterskifaciliteit en andere toeristische bedrijven  Heb je interesse  Stuur dan je cv voorzien van een motivatie t a v  Merel van Roden  Louter naar mlouter valkinternational com

Leer de organisatie kennen Onze opdrachtgever is een snelgroeiende no nonsense consultancy organisatie met een passie voor operationele processen  Zij helpen toonaangevende bedrijven bij het verbeteren van hun operationele performance  Deze verbetering is meetbaar  levert duurzaam resultaat op en wordt bereikt door het aanpassen van processen  technologie en organisatie  Dit resultaat bereiken hun medewerkers samen met de werknemers van hun klanten  Hun opdrachtgevers zijn bedrijven in de infrastructuur  telecombedrijven  banken en verzekeraars  bedrijven in de retail   industrie en energiebedrijven  Verder onderscheiden zij zichzelf in de markt door diepgaande proces  en systeemkennis constant te combineren met operationele realisatiekracht  Over de functie Als Junior Data Consultant sla jij de brug tussen data en de business  Hier krijg je eerst een intensieve vierweekse training waarbij je alle ins en outs leert binnen het vakgebied  Dit doe je samen met een klasje starters die allemaal dezelfde passie hebben als jij  Door deze Academy bouw je een solide basis om later waarde te kunnen toevoegen aan jouw klanten  Na de Academy mag je jouw kennis gaan toepassen bij grote organisaties zoals Alliander  de Belastingdienst  ABN AMRO  AEGON  Heineken of Siemens  Uiteraard word je verder ondersteund met specialistische trainingen  coaching on the job en soft skill trainingen  Daarna kan je doorgroeien naar onder andere Data Scientist  Data Engineer  Data Governance of Data Management om een expert te worden op jouw vakgebied  Jouw kwaliteiten VWO of HAVO en daarna een afgeronde WO of HBO  HBO met een IT gerelateerde studie  In staat om snel de processen en systemen van de klant te doorgronden Analytisch sterk en wil graag samen met collega s werken Job Title QMS Data Analyst Job Description Philips is a global leader in health technology  committed to improving billions of lives worldwide and striving to make the world healthier and more sustainable through innovation  Driven by the vision of a better tomorrow  But it s not just what we do  it s who we are  We are 80 000  wonderfully unique individuals  with two things in common  An unwavering sense of purpose and a relentless determination to deliver on our customers  needs  It s what inspires us to create meaningful solutions   the kind that make a real difference   when it matters most  The world and our customers  needs are changing faster than ever before and while we are proud of what we do already  we know we can do more  That s why we need you  to help us tackle increasingly complex challenges posed by ever evolving health and well being needs  In this role  you have the opportunity to make life better Looking at the challenges the world is facing today Philips  purpose has never been more relevant  So whatever your role  if you share our passion for helping others  you ll be working towards creating a better and fairer future for all  In this role  you will make an impact as the data analytics lead within the Philips Quality Management System  PQMS  organization  supporting the Image Guided Therapy  IGT  Systems business  The role involves working across IGT Systems to collect  analyze  and report on quality data to enable compliance  You are responsible for Ensuring accurate collection and reporting of QMS metrics required to show performance of IGT Systems as part of Management Review and Management Leadership reporting  Coordinating data across IGT Systems for reporting to business leadership  Compiling and reviewing Quality KPI s for IGT Systems  Compiling  analyzing  and effectively presenting trending reports to identify opportunities that increase efficiency and ensure quality  Developing and implementing tools and techniques resulting in recommendations that enable leadership to make better data based decisions  Using innovative data analysis methodologies to identify hidden insights from data available within Philips  Building custom data queries and standardized reports by collaborating with internal customers to understand their needs  Validating all standardized queries  reports  and metrics used for quality purposes  Creating and continually improving procedures and work instructions to ensure reliable  repeatable results  Supporting ongoing compliance improvement initiatives across IGT Systems  May provide logistical coordination and support for internal external audits and monthly meetings such as CAPA Review Board  You are a part of You will collaborate across departments and with central teams  This role is the analytics liaison between the central teams and the IGT Systems business  To succeed in this role  you should have the following skills and experience BS in Computer Science  Information Technology  Analytics  Business Administration  or related field  or 3 5 years equivalent industry related experience  Experience analyzing large sets of data in a regulated industry  Excellent customer service and interpersonal communication skills  including regularly leading presentations in front of leadership  Experience with data mining methods  statistical analysis    data visualization methods  Experience with SAP  Excel  TrackWise  Agile  etc  Experience working within a Quality Management System  Able to manage multiple projects simultaneously  Excellent teamwork skills  including influencing and building rapport with internal customers and stakeholders  In return  we offer you We welcome you to a challenging  innovative environment with great opportunities for you to explore  Why should you join Philips  Working at Philips is more than a job  It s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work  focused on innovative  customer first health technology solutions  Help us improve the health and well being of billions of people  every year  Ultimately creating a career that no one could have planned for  Even you   LI EU

Job Description As a Seismic Navigation Data Processor  you assist in all aspects of our seismic navigation requirements and deliverables  including QC  validating  and processing of seismic survey navigation sets  You assist project teams in setting up and verifying Starfix settings for seismic operations  In this varied role you provide support to operations in analysis and trouble shooting and assist the Seismic Navigation Supervisor as required  Your role You assist online surveyors in Starfix NG setup to ensure correct format and standard of deliverables are being realised  You are involved in Starfix configuration  analyse first line QC reports and provide feedback to the vessel  You assist in processing navigation data required in the production of project deliverables and in processing large data volumes to meet project requirements  You analyse the processes together with the Seismic Navigation Supervisor  assist in review  act upon lessons learned from wider project teams  and suggest improvements on the software where necessary  You provide feedback on project and mobilisation performance to seismic delivery team and make suggestions for improvement  You assist with training and knowledge dissemination  Your track record You have a high standard of general education  you have previous experience with both 2D and 3D seismic operations and you are familiar with geographical data and geodesic systems  You have good knowledge of Fugro Starfix Software  including Seismic Solution and Seismic Navigation QC widgets   UKOOA and OGP formats and are keen to learn in detail when required  You are able to assist in remote trouble shooting  and have experience in logsheet and report file handling  You are familiar with quality control logic and corresponding mathematics  You have excellent communication skills in English  verbal and written   What Fugro offers A competitive salary  29 holidays per year based on a fulltime employment  of which 4 are appointed by Fugro management  and the possibility to purchase 12 additional days  Extensive career   training opportunities both nationally and internationally  Flexible working hours and the ability to work from home in accordance with your manager and corporate policies  Commuting allowance  Modern pension scheme  Collective health insurance  Possibility to register with our corporate fitness plan  Coaching options through our EAP  Employee Assistance Program   Are you interested  Please visit our Company Page to find out more on what it is like to work at Fugro  For further information  please contact Stefanie Baldassarri Steenhauer  Corporate Recruiter  tel   31  0 6 114 55954   LI SB1 After you have applied You will receive an automated confirmation email of the receipt of your application  When we see a match  we will invite you for the first interview within a couple of days  Of course  you will also receive a message if we will not invite you  After a successful first round  you will be invited for the second round  If we are both still positive after the second interview  we will make you an offer  and with that we hope to welcome you at Fugro  Disclaimer for recruitment agencies  Fugro does not accept any unsolicited applications from recruitment agencies  Acquisition to Fugro Recruitment or any Fugro employee is not appreciated

job_desc: Introduction Do you want to make meaningful impact  with nice colleagues  in an expiring environment  helping our clients to increase their profit  expanding their business  transforming their business in high performing digital organizations  Then Accenture is looking for you  Your Job You will be part of a highly collaborative and growing network of technology and data experts  who are taking on today s biggest  most complex business challenges using the latest data and analytics technologies  We will nurture your talent in an inclusive culture that values diversity  You will have an opportunity to work in roles such as Cloud Data Engineer  Data Modeler or Data Architect covering all aspects of Data including Data Management  Data Governance and Data Migration  Come grow your career in Technology at Accenture  Your Team Technology continues to change the world as we know it  but to create a positive  meaningful impact  we must put people first  We do this by combining human ingenuity with groundbreaking technologies to solve complex problems and deliver innovation to build a more equal and inclusive society  With our partners  our clients and our communities  we are scaling these innovations and improving millions of lives around the world  now and for the future  Innovation is about bringing different people  ideas and perspectives together  As an  equal opportunities employer  Accenture welcomes all applications and does not discriminate  Working at Accenture means you have the access to a big network of specialists all over the world  which can be found via various streams and groups in our social network  You will develop yourself continuously by having challenging roles where you can learn from more experienced team members and by helping and coaching junior team members  You will build your career at Accenture by setting challenging goals for yourself on a frequent basis and asking continuous feedback from anyone you think has a good view on your work  Additionally  with outstanding training and learning opportunities  you can really focus on personal development and taking your career to the next level  Your Background Bachelor  or master s degree in  Business  computer science  mathematics  econometrics  statistics  ICT  Information System 3 7 years  experience in Analytics Data Engineering Experience working with one or more of the  major  cloud platforms   Azure AWS GCP Oracle and Snowflake Experience in data modeling  3NF  Kimball  Inmon or Data Vault  activities to capture and model data requirements  business rules  and logical and physical models  Experience with SQL databases to organize the collection  processing  optimizing and storing of data from different sources Experience with 2 or more of the following job_desc: Are you a talented technical Data Warehouse specialist  Do you have knowledge of  Business  data modelling  Do you know how to onboard new sources into the DWH from staging up to data mart and ensure the data quality of the data in the DWH  We are looking in particular for a colleague with sound experience with implementing end to end DWH processes on MS SQL server  Do you have a curious mind  love your job  are you eager to teach and to learn from others  be open  enthusiastic and have pro active attitude  Then we are looking for you What will you be doing  You will be part of the Enable Business Intelligence team  EBI  as Data Specialist  Together with the team and stakeholders you will  Pick user stories related to onboarding new sources  new fields and building reports  You will also work on maintaining and developing the SQL data warehouse  You will communicate and consult not only with your team  but also with other departments within the bank  Mainly focus on onboarding new sources into the DWH from staging up to data mart and ensure the data quality of the data in the DWH  Support the team on rebuilding our DWH processes on the Datawarehouse  DWH  to Azure AIS Cloud project  Contribute on the ongoing Self Service BI project where IDBI team enables our stakeholders to have the quality data and tooling available to create and maintain reports themselves  Decide on the data requirements  data quality rules  KPI s and the unifying data model in the data warehouse  Make sure the Data Warehouse is always filled with update and relevant data  Make sure that the Data Warehouse is compliant with the requirements from the regulators and the bank  Create insights into the Data Quality of the bank by building PowerBI dashboards and data visualizations  Constantly seek for opportunities to improve the data quality and find new data use cases  Work with the stakeholders on translating their requirements into data  sets   Design  develop and prototype your ideas on a daily basis if needed in  SQL  code  brown papers sessions  etc  Support multiple projects  The Department As Enable Business Intelligence department we are moving into the heart of the data delivery within GarantiBank NV  We are a small department of 4 ambitious engineers who like a challenging working environment  Our main goal is to show our colleagues what it means to be data driven  We are working together with the business to fully automate our reporting environment next to onboarding new sources and delivering on reporting requests  For us the environment is a green field with a lot of exciting technological challenges   Offering Self Service Reporting to the organization  Regulatory Reporting  Data Quality and Data warehouse Product Development are the main programs on our team s Service and Product catalogue   Core Banking System upgrade and Moving Datawarehouse  DWH  to Azure AIS Cloud are the new big projects on the horizon which will give us an opportunity to rebuilt our DWH processes and learn new technologies on Azure domain  EBI team run multiple projects under each program and responsible from the end to end project execution  Some of the projects we work at the moment are Regulatory Reporting Tool implementation  Data Governance tooling onboarding  Workflow automation with Power Automate  Our expectations of you  Overall  Preferable experience in the banking sector and financial products  To have at least a bachelor degree  technical studies are preferred   To have strong analytical skills  is able to structure his thoughts  code and work  To have strong communication skills and an international outlook  To be pro active and work independent  To have a professional  agile and continuous improvement mindset  To be able to prototype and productize concepts and ideas  To be able to document their work and development activities in parallel  last  but not least to have an entrepreneur mindset   Technical skills  Must haves  Experience with SQL queries and scripting   3  years  Knowledge and experience with Data Warehousing  Data Modeling  creating Data marts   3  years  Experience with automation concepts   architecture in combination with ETL and Reporting  Knowledge and experience with solving  data  incidents  Knowledge and experience with git version control system  Knowledge and experience with PowerBI  Nice to haves  Working experience in Agile way of working  Knowledge and experience with BI tooling in the cloud   preferably on Azure  Knowledge and experience with Data Modelling  e g  Kimball  Inmon  Linstedt   3  years  Knowledge and experience of Data Governance concepts and workflows  Knowledge and experience with Power Automate  Knowledge and experience with workflow orchestration tools like Airflow  Knowledge and experience with Agile tooling like JIRA  TopDesk  Knowledge of implementing Data Quality checks  Knowledge and experience with ITIL or COBIT framework  Knowledge and experience with BIAN or similar Data Model Why should you apply  You love data and analyzing it  You like to work in  uncharted waters  and create your own path within job_desc: FUNCTIEOMSCHRIJVING Organisaties beschikken over grote hoeveelheden waardevolle data  Veel van deze schatten aan informatie blijven tot op heden vaak onbenut  Zonde  Ben jij een Sherlock Holmes in hart en nieren  En word jij blij van speuren in grote bakken met big data  Wordt dan Junior Data Analist bij Breinstein en ontwikkel je in sneltreinvaart tot volwaardig professional in het vakgebied  WAT GA JE DOEN ALS JUNIOR DATA ANALIST IN REGIO GRONINGEN  Als Junior Data Analist volg je het traineeship data analytics  Tijdens dit tweejarige traject ontwikkel jij je tot volwaardig professional in data analytics  business analytics en data science  Je doet praktische ervaring op bij één of meerdere van onze interessante opdrachtgevers binnen profit of non profit  Bij onze opdrachtgevers ontwikkel jij je onder anderen in het goed uitvragen van de klantvraag  welk inzicht willen ze graag hebben  Middels SQL en Python weet jij de data uit verschillende databronnen te ontsluiten  Door geavanceerde analyses op big data los te laten in R of Python  en door het maken van data visualisaties  dashboards  waar Picasso jaloers op zou zijn  kom jij tot waardevolle inzichten  Jij blijft niet achter je computer zitten maar trekt de organisatie in om jouw vondsten onder de aandacht te brengen  Je weet de brug te slaan tussen de big data en de praktijk en bent een èchte data translator  Zo maakt jij impact binnen de organisatie  Tevens volg je 1 á 2 dagen per maand opleidingsdagen op post master niveau waar zowel theorie  als praktijkkennis wordt gedeeld door hoogleraren van de Vrije Universiteit en senior professionals uit het bedrijfsleven  Hoe tof is dat  WAT BIEDEN WE JOU  Een vast contract  ja echt   Een startsalaris van 2700 euro bruto per maand Een opleiding op post master niveau op het gebied van Business Analytics   Data Science  gegeven door hoogleraren van de VU Amsterdam Verdiepende cursussen gegeven door senior data scientists in machine learning  Python  R  SQL  textmining  data visualisatie  Scrum Master training  omgaan met weerstand en dergelijke Uitdagende opdrachten binnen bijvoorbeeld gemeenten  ministeries  luchtvaartmaatschappijen  winkelketens  verzekeraars en NGO s  Ontdek waar jouw passie ligt Een groot netwerk van professionals en andere vakidioten waar jij op terug kunt vallen Kennissessies die ervoor zorgen dat jij up to date bent in het vakgebied Een fieldcoach voor een snellere persoonlijke ontwikkeling Een super gezellige kickoff dag waar jij jouw mede junior data analisten goed leert kennen Pensioenopbouw  toch lekker voor later  25 vakantiedagen en 8 33  vakantiegeld Reiskostenvergoeding WAT VRAGEN WIJ  Jij hebt een passie voor puzzelen in grote hoeveelheden big data en weet de juiste informatie daar uit te halen  Daarnaast heb je  Een afgeronde Masteropleiding met een kwantitatief karakter  bijvoorbeeld in de richting van Economie  Marketing Analytics  Data Science  een Research Master  Neuroscience  Sociale Wetenschappen of Earth Science  Uitstekende kennis op het gebied van toegepast onderzoek  data analytics en statistiek Praktische ervaring vanuit stage of studie met data analytics tools zoals Stata  Matlab  GIS  Python  R  SQL of vergelijkbaar  Een grote dosis enthousiasme en overtuigingskracht zodat de organisatie écht wat met jouw resultaten gaat doen  Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal op C1 of C2 niveau  WAT KAN BREINSTEIN VOOR JOU BETEKENEN  Jij hebt je Master opleiding afgerond  Nu ben je op zoek naar de perfecte baan en een vliegende start van je carrière  Dat is precies waar wij bij Breinstein gespecialiseerd in zijn  Daarnaast werken we landelijk  dus ook bij jou in de buurt  Tijdens ons gesprek leren we jou kennen zodat we weten wat jouw droombaan is  Breinstein zet zich in om deze droombaan voor jou te bemachtigen  Wij zorgen dat je niet tussen de eindeloze stapel cv s van concurrenten komt te liggen  maar krijgen jou direct aan tafel bij de juiste persoon binnen de organisatie  En ben jij bang je sollicitatiegesprek bij de opdrachtgever van je dromen te verpesten  Geen nood  wij pimpen jouw cv in een mooi cv template  geven je cv tips en gaan met jou mee op sollicitatiegesprek  Vooraf krijg je ook een sollicitatietraining met sollicitatie tips en oefenen wij jouw sollicitatie pitch zodat je gaat vlammen tijdens het gesprek  Breinstein staat voor fun  ondernemerschap  verbinding en het hebben van een groei mindset  De sfeer op kantoor is informeel  en we zoeken elkaar regelmatig op voor borrels en andere leuke uitjes  Wil jij binnenkort mee met een van onze vele personeelsuitjes  Solliciteer dan vandaag nog  ZIT JIJ NOG OP HET PUNTJE VAN JE STOEL  Om onze kwaliteit hoog te houden hebben we een beperkt aantal plaatsen beschikbaar  Gelukkig hebben wij een plekje voor jou gereserveerd  Reageer nu snel op onze vacature  Wil je meer informatie over deze vacature neem dan vrijblijvend contact op met Danielle Swets  Stuur een mail naar danielleswets breinstein nl of bel naar 06 20662841

The job of a Junior FP A Analyst  Working within the Financial Planning   Analysis team  FP A   you will provide the Business with key financial analysis for decision making  Under the direct supervision of a Commercial Analyst  you will support the FP A Team  Business Leaders and Departments with the information to evaluate operational performance and opportunities within the designated function s    Your role is key in processing  analyzing  and interpreting the data that we collect from our channel partners distributor network  Our partners are sharing Point Of Sales  POS  and Inventory data  which enables our business to make informed strategic decisions  you provide ad hoc analyses and support to the business  you proactively challenge results and seek opportunities to improve sales out   You produce custom made reports and dashboards by making use of BI tools and Excel  you will develop and demonstrate a strong business understanding  which is reflected in the reports  analysis  and commentaries provided  and assist the FP A Manager in managing the overall business highlighting opportunities for improvement  Additional responsibilities that come with this role   Continuously improve efficiency  quality and speed of cleaning  consolidating and reporting the data that we receive from our distributor network Follow up on performance and prepare daily weekly updates   Monitor KPIs in coordination with the business leaders   About the team  The FP A team is an international and diverse group of nine team players  All colleagues have their own specialties and focus areas but there is a lot of interaction and support to each other  We are dynamic and innovative  used to working with deadlines  but also find the time to have fun  Experience  Experience in cleaning and combining multiple data sources   Ability to meet tight deadlines  handle a demanding and fluctuating workload and at the same time provide accurate and reliable data   High level Excel skills  experience with Oracle and Hyperion would be a plus  Experience with Power Query  Power BI  and DAX is also considered to be a pre   A Bachelor s degree in Data Analytics and or Finance related studies or an equivalent of 1 3 years of experience as an analyst in an international  corporate  environment   Fluency in English  mastery of other  European  languages would be a plus   Personal skills  Thoroughness and attention to detail with steadiness under pressure  You are a team player who shows energy and persistence   Strong communication skills and the ability to combine your understanding of the financial process with persuasiveness and confidence   Development opportunities  We offer an environment in which you can  further  develop your skills in the area of Data Analytics and or Financial Planning  You can think of the following tasks that will help you gain knowledge and experience   Support with developing  testing  updating  and improving BI reports and dashboards  Support and drive the Business Teams in the preparation of the Annual Budget and Monthly Forecast  Analyze monthly results versus Monthly Forecast and Budget  find opportunities to improve Forecast Accuracy  Work together with the Commercial Analyst to prepare monthly forecast updates  analyze the impact of price adjustments  prepare margin analyses  Assist with testing  updating and improving BI reports and dashboards   Future prospects will become available for those that show drive  determination and ultimately achieve results  To make the application process easier  please skip filling in the fields and simply upload your resume as a PDF using your first and last name as the file name  Example  firstname lastname pdf  Fortive is a diversified industrial growth company comprised of global businesses that are recognized leaders in attractive markets  With more than  6 billion in annual revenues  Fortive s well known brands hold leading positions in field instrumentation  transportation  sensing  product realization  automation and specialty  and franchise distribution   Fortive is headquartered in Everett  Washington and employs a team of more than 24 000 research and development  manufacturing  sales  distribution  service and administrative employees in more than 40 countries around the world  Our team grows by tackling challenges that accelerate progress and further their careers  With a culture rooted in continuous improvement  the core of our company s operating model is the Fortive Business System  For more information please visit  www fortive com    Fluke Corporation is the world leader in the manufacture  distribution and service of electronic test tools and software  We are a dynamic market leader with sound financial health  Fluke has achieved the number one or number two position in every market in which it competes  The Fluke brand has a reputation for portability  ruggedness  safety  ease of use and rigid standards of quality  A wholly owned subsidiary of Fortive Corporation   www fortive com    Fluke is a multi national corporation headquartered in the greater Seattle area  We offer an entrepreneurial environment that is team centered  customer driven  quality focused  and growth oriented  It is driven by the phenomenally successful Fortive Business System  Working at Fluke gives you access to a robust career development process and challenging   stretch  opportunities

ook een bijdrage aan het verbeteren van de data kwaliteit door zo vroeg mogelijk bij de ontwikkeling van data generatieprocessen betrokken te zijn  Je ontwerpt  Business Rules  voor modellen waarmee  Je bent in staat om te werken met de meest moderne IT toepassingen  die jouw werkzaamheden alleen maar makkelijker en beter maken  Je hebt bij voorkeur ervaring met Big Data concepten en Integration Expert you will act as the bridge between the FrieslandCampina business and IT to channel the requirements  in order to make the right data available from our wide range of IT products  Whilst making sure the current business is not affected by outages and system performance is optimal  What we ask The person we are looking for recognises him  herself in  most of  the following requirements 6  years proven hands on experience as an Enterprise Data Integration Expert Proficient understanding for Enterprise Data Integration Minimum Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science  Information Technology  or equivalent  Hands on technical experience with SAP SLT  SAP DI and Azure ADF is preferred Comfortable with Agile methodologies and DevOps Knowledge on Python  PySpark and SQL or NoSQL A strong business partner  taking ownership of the Data Integration topic Strong ability to hit tight deadlines and work under pressure if required Solid analytical skills and attention to detail Eagerness to learnWhat we offer A position where you can make a huge impact  Availability of the right data is of core essence for our business  Unique company culture of Dutch heritage and journey Exceptional support of cross disciplinary movement within the company to broaden your knowledge and growth paths A friendly and informal working environment  yet professional team members as sparring partners Autonomy and trust to create longer term impact that helps bring better nutrition to the world Ofcourse  when working at FrieslandCampina  our heart is with our dairy products  That s why you can enjoy free cheese and milk at lunch in the central office and barista coffee to help you go through your working days with a lot of joy  Vacancy description As Data Integration Expert any data integration issues as required

en energiebedrijven  Verder onderscheiden zij zichzelf in de markt door diepgaande proces  en systeemkennis constant te combineren met operationele realisatiekracht  Over de functie Als Junior Data Consultant sla jij de brug tussen data en de business  Hier krijg je eerst een intensieve vierweekse training waarbij je alle ins en outs leert binnen het vakgebied  Dit doe je samen met een klasje starters die allemaal dezelfde passie hebben als jij  Door deze Academy bouw je een solide basis om later waarde te kunnen toevoegen aan jouw klanten  Na de Academy mag je jouw kennis gaan toepassen daarna een afgeronde WO of HBO  HBO met een IT gerelateerde studie  In staat om snel de processen en systemen van de klant te doorgronden Analytisch sterk en wil graag samen met collega s werken Ambitieus Je spreekt vloeiend Nederlands én EngelsDe voordelen Jonge  ambitieuze omgeving waar ontwikkeling centraal staat  Veel vrijheid en verantwoordelijkheid  Gestructureerde coaching van een eigen mentor  Evenementen en borrels met je nieuwe collega s  Uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden  Boven marktconform salaris  bonus  leaseauto  laptop en telefoon Klinkt goed  Ben jij geïnteresseerd in bovenstaand profiel  Good Company ziet graag jouw sollicitatie tegemoet  Door middel van het klikken op de solliciteerbutton kom je in een overzichtelijk sollicitatiescherm waar je met jouw CV of LinkedIn profiel kan reageren op de vacature van Junior Data Consultant

Zenz Technologies Amsterdam What is required  Academic degree  preferably beta Interested in software and technical knowledge Analytical and communicating skills Proficient command of the English language  preferably Dutch Goal oriented and driven What will you get   3 000    3 500 gross p m  starters salary  Profit sharing scheme 40 hour workweek 25 vacation days Opportunities to follow external trainings and courses Phone  laptop and flexible working  from home  possible As a Consultant Data Science at Zenz Technologies  you work together with clients to give them optimal insight in their data  You do this partly by means of extensive implementation projects  and partly by delivering support once the software has been implemented  Clients are often airlines and train companies  and you work closely together to fully understand their business needs and wishes   As Zenz aims to maintain long term relationships with their clients  it is essential to ensure the client receives high quality support  You do this by building a strong relationship with the clients  stakeholder s  as well as the application users  You can assist clients where needed because you are easily approachable and have extensive knowledge of the software  You understand the coding behind the software and are able to translate the clients wishes into clean code  Besides this  you also host business visits or digital meetings to show the users the software s features  You are the first point of contact for the clients under your responsibility  and the full implementation team or technical colleagues  Therefore  it is important to have business  customer and programming skills  Firsthand experience A train company wants to analyze the load factor of its trains  to maximize the number of tickets sold  and prevent wasted empty seats  How do you help them  Together with the client  you discuss the business need and technical impact  On average a train can be quite empty on a route  but if there is one segment on the route that is already sold out  no one can buy a ticket from the start to the end anymore  Together  you decide that it is more interesting to look at the  maximum load factor   to report per train the load factor of the segment with the highest load factor  With the internal Zenz team you discuss the technical impact  because this customised solution should of course still perform very fast  Depending on your experience and personal preference  you will program the feature or outsource this to a Software Engineer colleague  You keep the client updated on the progress  and will demonstrate the feature once it is unrolled

As a Sustainability Data Analyst  you will be responsible for delivering impactful data and digital solutions to drive and support sustainability within FrieslandCampina  You will deliver on this responsibility by collaborating with a highly specialized and skilled set of colleagues from the Farm  Milk   Sustainability team  but also Digital R D  ICT and external parties  In this specific role as a Digital Analyst  you will focus on enabling data driven decision making in the area of sustainability  As a sustainability data analyst you  Engage with business stakeholders to understand their sustainability challenges and translate them into digital needs Define  develop  embed and maintain sustainable digital solutions  with DevOps team  Stay up to date on the evolving landscape of tools and technologies  invest in learning some of the relevant tools  especially related to processing large amounts of data   and proactively experiment with them to stay at the cutting edge Build a network of experts  inside and outside FC  to consult on tools and techniques Provide input into overall sustainability strategy and plans  and contribute to digital sustainability capability building  What we ask Academic degree in computer science  information technology or in a relevant business domain  e g   Environmental science Background in sustainability a plus  interest in sustainability a must Experienced in developing dashboards to deliver insights using dashboarding tools  e g  PowerBI  Experience with SQL and Non SQL databases  especially Graph Databases is a plus   data driven analyses using python R Knowledge on methodologies such as Life Cycle Assessment  LCA  on  parts of  the dairy chain is a plus A continuous improvement  and equally importantly a continuous learning mindset   as the tool landscape in Digital evolves considerably with time Ability to challenge status quo and create enthusiasm for change Good communication  listening  and presentation skillsWhat we offer Opportunity to step into the important world of sustainability Opportunity to work throughout the chain and ability to create real impact Exposure to a wide diversity of business and farm challenges in RFC Competitive salary and benefits A highly skilled  ambitious and fun team  who values change and sees opportunities Hybrid and flexible way of working Learning and growth opportunitiesVacancy description As a Sustainability Data Analyst  you will be responsible for delivering impactful data and digital solutions to drive and support sustainability within FrieslandCampina  You will deliver on this responsibility by collaborating with a highly specialized and skilled set of colleagues from the Farm  Milk   Sustainability team  but also Digital R D  ICT and external parties  In this specific role as a Digital analyst  you will focus on enabling data driven decision making in the area of sustainability

Stel je eens voor  dat je werkt in een internationale context waarin het aangaan van uitdagingen  meedoen aan projecten en innovatie centraal staan  Als junior data analist binnen het Finance   Risk domein kun je dit waarmaken  In deze rol werk je in het hart van de Rabobank Groep  Alle interne  en externe rapportages worden verzorgd vanuit dit domein  Je bent omringt door energieke en inspirerende collega s en samen ga je aan de slag om uitdagingen op het gebied van nieuwe regelgeving en datamanagement te trotseren  Deze rol biedt je de mogelijkheid om samen te werken en contacten Organization  As our Enterprise Data Governance Advisor  you become part of the central team responsible for steering the Data Governance of ABN AMRO  The team is diverse with regards to culture  experiences and age  The atmosphere is lively and informal  and the environment is safe  Your colleagues are really passioned to bring data under governance to make it easier to use data  Focus is to support the data driven organisation bringing data use to the next level  Data Governance is mean and not a goal   In your day to day work you have a crucial role in facing the most complex data management puzzles head on  and solving them  Next to your day to day work  there is room to design  create and implement new processes especially when you are the one who is suggesting the change for the better   The team you become part of is in constant collaboration with all business lines  international branches and subsidiaries of the bank  We all work together at the frontier of the largest data revolution in the banking industry and with the core value assets of the organization   Position  As our Enterprise Data Governance Advisor  you help realise the delivery of the ABN AMRO strategy  a Personal Bank in a Digital Age  You ensure that the entire bank follows the correct route towards a fully data driven organisation  From shaping new concepts to designing and guiding data management initiatives  You are able to quickly submerge yourself in a brand new initiative  shape  socialise and ensure it is properly anchored for successful execution  You are a Data Management expert able to translate our data vision into reality  How  By creative thinking and being assertive  You identify challenges and based on your experience recommend the best way forward  You have a proven track record in data management and are able to get people  especially senior management  to rally behind the conceptual and complex topics you are working on   Some examples of your responsibilities  Spot external trends and internal drivers for change  Act as a sparring partner for the Heads of Business Data Governance  Maintain and further develop our bank wide Data Management Framework  Identify challenges in executing our Data Strategy and recommend the best way forward  Drive sensitive organisational change topics related to Data Management  Job Requirements  You are a conceptual thinker  but can translate concepts to pragmatic solutions whose behaviour reflects the culture principles of courage  care and collaboration  This is reflected by your eagerness to learn  the questions you dare to ask and the status quo you are willing to challenge  New and tough data management puzzles and jumping into the unknown is what makes you happy  You get even more excited when the only assignment you are given to start with is   please help us figure this one out    You know where to start  how to tackle complex problems  and bring them to a successful result  In doing so  you know how to handle conversations on various management levels to keep everyone informed  and know which information you should present and in what format depending on the stakeholder groups you are dealing with  This is on your resume   Master s degree  Experience in Data Management  strategy   design  Solid track record in implementing Data Management in complex environments  Sparring partner for senior management  Sound knowledge of Data Management  Fluent in English  Dutch is a bonus   Excellent interpersonal and communication skills  Offer  The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have  Care  Collaboration and Courage are our key values  Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures  knowledge and experience  Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation  To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents  we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated  A few examples of our excellent terms of employment   The opportunity to play a key role in the execution of our Data Strategy and room to grow both personally and professionally  A good work life balance  and help on boost your vitality and fitness  A market conform salary of 60 000 to 92 500  based on 36 hours  and an additional benefit budget of 11  with which you can buy flexible terms of employment  Five weeks of holiday per year  A personal development budget of  1000 per year and various internal trainings  A high degree of responsibility and freedom to finish your tasks  Good set of facilities for remote working  Application  Are you interested  Please leave your motivation and your CV behind using te  Solliciteren  button below  If you have any questions about this rol please call me  Stefan van Rumpt   Stefan van Rumpt  31  0  6 46 99 32 72   s v rumpt cmotions nl

The team The Impact Measurement and Integrated Reporting  IMIR  team is part of the Finance  Impact and Data department within FMO  IMIR is responsible for defining  harmonizing and carrying out impact measurement to provide information in support of FMO s mission and strategy  In addition  the team supports the organization s non financial planning and control cycle to help steer FMO towards reaching its strategic goals and objectives  Furthermore  IMIR ensures our internal and external stakeholders are informed on the progress FMO is making towards reaching these goals and other  inter national commitments FMO has signed along the way  The ESG and Impact reporting space is developing rapidly  For years FMO has applied voluntary standards and frameworks  IIRC and GRI  to report on ESG  impact and other non financial information  FMO welcomes the standardization of  inter national rules and regulations around how such information is presented in the future to drive transparent and consistent reporting in the financial services industry that is integrated and at par with financial reporting standards  FMO is getting ready for the upcoming EU sustainable finance regulation and other reporting commitments and is  therefore  looking for an Impact Officer with a focus on data analysis   Your role Implement processes to capture data and prepare reports  We are looking for an impact officer that will support the IMIR team implementing new processes to collect and process data to align with the upcoming reporting requirements and support current internal and external reporting processes  The role includes data treatment and modelling as well as good project management skills to drive design and implementation of methodologies supporting the reporting requirements  You will work with the project team working on implementation of the EU Sustainable Finance Regulation and with the Sustainability Measurement team  identifying the current gaps and developing plans for key developments in the field of ESG and Impact data collection processing and reporting that are relevant to FMO  This role offers the opportunity to get to know the world of development finance through dealing with data and management information and connecting with colleagues from across FMO   Your backgroundAffinity with the values and mission of FMO Master s degree with a relevant background  e g  Information Management  Econometrics  Business Administration  At least 4 years of professional experience in the field of data treatment and reporting ideally with experience in non financial sustainability data Proven project management skills Excellent stakeholder management skills with experience working and developing successful relationships with internal and external stakeholders Excellent written and verbal communication skills in FMO s working language  English  Proficiency in Microsoft Office and other data tools and languages  Excel  Python  SQL  Word and Powerpoint  What is in it for you  Besides a market conformed salary and additional benefits  we offer you a job on a global scale in a challenging environment  A professional career and all the support you will need for both your professional and personal development

Join Avanade s Data Analytics Techionista Academy   Avanade proudly launches the Data Analytics Academy  in collaboration with Avanade and Techionista  offering you the unique opportunity to grow your capabilities  Whether or not you have relevant experience  this Academy is designed to give you the skills and certifications so you can take your career to new heights in the field of data and artificial intelligence   The Data Analytics Techionista Academy is      The 100  online Academy will introduce you to the world of data and analytics  Sessions will take place in English and combines theoretical modules with practical work modules  Avanade offers you a unique opportunity to kickstart your career in Tech   The technical components of the Techionista Academy comprise of the following Microsoft Certifications  Azure Fundamentals AZ 900  Data Analyst DA 100 and Azure Data Engineer DP 203  The duration of the academy is 16 weeks starting in May 2022  We are looking for smart and motivated individuals who are eager to learn and who isn t afraid of change  Do you find the world of Data Analytics fascinating  Are you ready for a new career  This is your chance   Why Avanade   Distinctive experiences  Limitless learning  Ambitious growth  That s what you get when you choose to join and build your career at Avanade  Our commitment to innovation means there is always something new to learn and explore  And our commitment to our people means that you will have lots of opportunities to grow your knowledge and skill through formal training and on the job learning  This program is ideal if you have An interest in data and analytics  A desire to train on the Microsoft Azure Cloud and or if you already hold a Microsoft certification  Exposure to any data related tools such Tableau  Excel VBA  SQL etc The desire to challenge yourself to join a consulting business  You have a very good level of written and spoken Dutch   English   What will be your role in our Avanade Data Analytics team after the academy   Within our data analytics team we have multiple roles  As you progress through the academy we will help you identify which roles you would like to be aligned with  Below is a brief overview of two of our roles  Data Engineer  Do you love making sure that information is available and consumable  So do we   As a Data Engineer Consultant  you know the importance of data to the business  You design and set up projects that bring together information from various sources to enable analysis and decision making  You make sure that data is accessible and easy to use for routine and ad hoc analysis  Day to day  you will be Finding trends in data sets and developing algorithms to help make raw data more useful to the enterprise  Collecting the data from various sources  transforming it into desire formats  and storing it into data stores like Data Lake  Azure Synapse Analytics  Implementing complex  large scale big data projects focusing on collecting  managing  analyzing  and visualizing large datasets  Taking part in designing and running bespoke data services for individual projects  Staying up to date with leading edge processes in using  retrieving data  building machine learning models  Crafting and use effective metrics and monitoring processes  Support deal teams by providing subject knowledge and solutions for client proposals   Power BI Consultant  Do you love telling stories with data using modern visualisation techniques  So do we   The role of a Power BI consultant is a mixture of consulting skills alongside technical data modelling and visualisation skills   Our projects are varied and may be anything from creating a short proof of value to a large reporting suite as part of a modern data platform solution in Azure   As part of a large global community of Power BI consultants within Avanade  there is extensive training  support and guidance to help to develop your Power Platform skills to the next level  Responsibilities Include Ingesting data from a variety of data sources and performing required transformations using Power Query and Data Flows  Data modelling capabilities including designing effective BI data models in line with the Kimball methodology and best practice  Publishing reports via the Power BI service  managing them through distribution of apps and monitoring usage data refreshes security access  N  for large scale deployments this is often undertaken by our managed services team   Working closely with clients  gathering requirements and translating them  Shaping an approach for governance and deployment of Power BI in large organisations  including advising on licensing  distribution sharing  training  support and best practices   Why would you choose Avanade  You will become part of an active and growing data analytics community  Your future colleagues will help you with questions and challenges  Moreover  there is a pleasant  informal working atmosphere  Knowledge development is our focus  and we ensure this both by offering formal training opportunities as well as informal evenings where peers share their knowledge  With your passion  you can use the latest Microsoft technology to make a daily difference for our customers in the Enterprise market  We have a strong focus on the career and development opportunities of all our people  Everyone has a career advisor who will work with you to create a plan and guide you in choosing from the many training opportunities we offer

betrouwbaar zijn  Jouw werkzaamheden Je ontwikkelt nieuwe Power BI dashboards voor onze afdelingen  Je onderhoudt en verbetert waar nodig onze bestaande Power BI dashboards  Je brengt de informatiebehoefte van onze stakeholders in kaart  Je beschrijft de verschillende business processen binnen de verschillende afdelingen  Je verzamelt relevante data en ontwikkelt datamodellen  Je valideert nieuwe data in het data warehouse  Je brengt verbetervoorstellen in om de datakwaliteit te optimaliseren  Je hebt een actieve rol in het initiëren van rapportages  adviezen en trendanalyses waarmee je impact weet te creëren  Je denkt mee bij de implementatie van nieuwe systemen  Je adviseert het MT en signaleert en identificeert risico sDit bieden wij Een afwisselende baan bij een snel
