data objects and operating companies Learning and growth opertunities on data project and change management A competitive salary Great office in Amersfoort and working from home at least 50 Vacancy description People  Build and maintain excellent work relationships Train and share knowledge within ED ACC but also with key users in the business Provide support and insights  qualitative and quantitative  to the business stakeholders at all levels in order to ensure the operational E2E processes are to the extent required  supported by good quality master data Process  Govern  streamline and improve the E2E master data maintenance processes and drive integration with business operations Drive for operational excellence and business results  Use knowledge gained in other areas  businesses  industries to initiate and formulate common processes and best practices and thus enabling business to derive value from master data  Assess master data management and related activities  identify  analyse risks and drive opportunities to make improvements at all levels in the process  Data  Must ensure that master data  within the domain  stays fit to run the business activities on ongoing basis Assess master data management and related activities  identify  analyse risks and drive opportunities to make improvements at all levels in the process  On periodic basis  report the quality of the master data towards business stakeholders and identify initiatives driving towards a high level of data availability and consistency Technology Advise on the most efficient technology to be used in order to support business master data requirements Other Provide change management leadership to ensure achievement of targeted performance levels Where required  contribute with information and analysis to organizational plans and reviews Be recognoized as an expert and problem solver by providing expertsise on solution and knowldegde business processes

Position  Data Analyst   Product Location  Amsterdam About CSS CSS is a trusted global RegTech partner that uniquely brings together innovative technology  driven solutions to support financial services firms in navigating a clear and strategic path through the complex and fragmented global regulatory space  Our solutions and services help firms meet regulatory deadlines while optimizing compliance data  operations  and technology  CSS covers a full range of global compliance disciplines spanning fund reporting  transaction reporting  investment monitoring  compliance management  compliance services and managed services with a complementary  centralized approach to the strategic management of regulatory data called RBOR  Regulatory Book of Record   For more information on CSS  please visit  www cssregtech com  About the role CSS is looking for an experienced Data Analyst who is passionate about building software products and services that solve and simplify customer business problems  The ideal candidate will currently be working in the RegTech   FinTech space as a product or business analyst  or indeed be working in the investment industry for an investment management firm or third party fund administrator   service provider as a business analyst with direct exposure and interaction with financial market data with respect to the global asset management industry  The role will specifically appeal to a person that has high attention to detail and enjoys working in a fast paced strategic environment with direct exposure to the market  clients  prospects  sales   marketing  on one side  and will work very closely with the internal delivery teams  implementation  on the other  About the team The successful candidate will join a dynamic environment working with cross functional teams  specifically Professional Services  to evaluate  triage  and make recommendations for remediation of financial market data requirements and configuration across client portfolios  Skills and competencies  the ideal candidate will have  The following are key facets of the duties and responsibilities connected to this role  Collaborate on the team effort to gather and document data requirements for our Investment Monitoring platform  including client data validation  remediation recommendations  and configuration seeking clearly defined acceptance criteria  Gain a deep understanding of customer experience working closely with the client implementation and services teams to identifying and filling data gaps  and generate new ideas that grow market share  improve customer experience and drive growth  Assist the product management team maintain the relevant product feature backlog and roadmap  as well as feeding into the process of prioritization of tickets for each product sprint based on service team  market  and customer impact Requisite ability and initiative to  o Perform product data analytics related to filing workflows using large volume data feeds from upstream financial systems o Perform analysis related to business user workflow requirements and calculations to determine gaps between product solution and regulatory requirements o Translate regulatory technical standard requirements provided by regulator competent authorities or in house regulatory guidance team into functional requirements that will be used by our system architects and developers Along with the product owner managers  act as a product evangelist to build awareness and understanding of the product within the CSS Professional Services and the market space that Investment Monitoring serves  Represent the company by visiting customers to solicit feedback on company products and services  Feed into the process where we develop clear strategic vision for our product  Assist with product demonstrations and presentations to internal and external audiences   including supporting sales as a product SME  Requirements Strong financial data analysis capabilities  Data management  Data Sourcing  ETL  Data Schema  model  and Data Field mapping  Strong analytical and data requirement documentation skills  Experience with data modelling and data mapping Experience with security master or data warehouse projects  and or experience of financial reporting projects  Ability to quickly learn and deliver with limited oversight Very high attention to detail Ability to work with multiple internal parties  Sales  Product  Dev  Support  etc   to prioritize activities and execute implementation Desired Skills Client facing implementation and project execution Financial Regulation expertise knowledge Knowledge of sensitive industries  shareholder disclosure  exchange position limit guidelines Fund administrator system knowledge  client setup and maintenance  Knowledge of Bloomberg Project management tools  JIRA  Microsoft Project  Salesforce  SharePoint  System implementation experience For immediate consideration  send your CV Resume to  careers cssregtech com Please include the job title in the subject line of your e mail  CSS is an equal opportunity employer

Your energy As an Energy Data Expert at System Operations  you work with multidisciplinary teams to create the electrical grid of the future  The energy transition presents Alliander with an enormous challenge  The increase in decentralised generation  increasing electricity consumption  the introduction of heat grids and new gases in a single integrated energy system  alongside the creation of the infrastructure and market facilitation to realise these energy flows  necessitate a fundamentally different approach to our processes and services  The team at System Operations works hard to deliver solutions that allow us to make smarter and more efficient use of our electrical grids for our customers  And that s where you come in  because you re the team s technical expert  Your daily work involves transforming innovative ideas for our customers into concrete solutions and processes  One example is a new grid structure that allows us to prevent and resolve congestion in the electrical grid  As an expert at System Operations  you are capable of thinking outside the box  You continuously develop new  technologically innovative solutions  Your environment You and your fellow experts are the technical core and the beating heart of a Scrum team that brings together expertise about energy technology  As a team  you have the space and autonomy to determine your own course as you design and realise the electrical grid of the future  while coordinating as necessary with your environment  In concrete terms  your work involves developing concepts and carrying out grid calculations to realise customer connections without making major capital investments  This is how you contribute to an affordable  reliable and stable electrical grid for today and tomorrow  You are part of one or more multidisciplinary teams that  assess and estimate the impact of customer applications  new customer propositions and technological innovations on our grids and systems  determine the conditions to allow new solutions to be implemented  implement  or arrange the implementation of  technological innovations and modifications within and beyond System Operations in consultation with stakeholders  At the front end  you ensure effective coordination with our end users and supply chain partners  You work with your fellow experts specialists  Scrum masters and product owners  You prepare and maintain user stories and prioritise these based on the backlog  Your employer We are Alliander  a group made up of various companies  including Liander  Qirion and Kenter  We develop and maintain the electrical grid for millions of users in the Netherlands  That s quite a challenge  especially as the energy transition is now in full swing  Thankfully  we can count on the knowledge and skills of our 7 000 professionals  Together  we devise and realise technically smart solutions to prepare our electrical grid for the future  We also try to minimise our carbon emissions while doing business sustainably  In this role  you will join the 7 000 employees of Liander  the grid operator  Together  they manage the daily distribution of gas and electricity through our grids  You share your expertise within the System Operations department  On the work floor  you ll find 15 multidisciplinary teams of 7 10 people who are young at heart and ambitious  Although the teams work hard  there s still time for a joke and a friendly pat on the shoulder  Thanks to the intensive teamwork  they are also very close  System Operations works in an Agile way to deliver the energy supply of the future  One example is the spike app  which allows us to predict and resolve spikes in our grid load  This helps us prevent our electrical grids from becoming overloaded and ensures a reliable energy supply for our customers  System Operations is thus an essential part of Liander and is always looking for new innovations that improve our service  Your working conditions You have the energy  we give you the space   the space to get the best out of yourself  Because that benefits everyone  you  Alliander and most of all our customers  And there s more  In this role  you can expect  based on a 38 hour working week   A good salary  depending on your training and experience  junior max  gross monthly salary  4 530  scale 8   mid level max  gross monthly salary  5 127  scale 9  gross monthly salary  senior max  gross monthly salary  6 001  scale 10   A permanent contract after one year  A Personal Budget of 18  of your annual salary on a full time basis  You can choose to have this paid out  to purchase extra leave days or to pay it into your pension  An allowance of 70  of the statutory minimum wage for parental leave hours  This applies if you take parental leave after one year of service  36 hours  4 5 days  extra saved leave each year  You can use this leave or save it for up to 10 years for a sabbatical etc  A long term employability budget of  500  You can use this for career development  a gym membership and or ergonomic home office furniture etc  A pension with ABP  Alliander pays 70  of your pension premium  A fixed year end bonus of 5 94   Alliander offers you plenty of space and opportunities for development  We work with the best trainers in the Netherlands  You can choose from a wide range of training courses  workshops  study programmes  study books  webinars and e learning modules  An NS Business Card or a mileage allowance if you travel by car  A gross contribution of  360 and discounts on supplementary insurance if you have a collective health insurance policy with Zilveren Kruis Achmea  A laptop and mobile phone  or Bring Your Own Device  You ll be surprised by the excellent working conditions at Alliander  We have listed these for you at https   werkenbij alliander com arbeidsvoorwaarden Your background Your energy means you excel as an expert  Your motivation  skills and broad perspective help you take the team to the next level  You actively seek out collaboration  both within and beyond System Operations  You are a hard worker who can operate effectively at the strategic  tactical and operational level  and you don t give up easily  You re not afraid to try new things  At System Operations  we believe in  learning by doing   This also means you have a huge amount of freedom to work autonomously as a team  This role offers you the opportunity to develop and grow into the role of senior expert or Product Owner  In your work  Energy Technology and IT come together  What we ask of you  At least a completed Higher Vocational Education  HBO  or university degree in electrical engineering  energy technology  control engineering  physics or mechanical engineering and experience with IT or A completed Higher Vocational Education  HBO  or university degree in IT Data Science and experience with electrical engineering  energy technology or physics Experience with low voltage  medium voltage or high voltage grid structures or security concepts  load flow calculations  short circuit calculations or selectivity calculations would be an advantage  That you are an innovative thinker with strong analytical skills and problem solving competences who can bridge the gap between energy technology and IT solutions  That you are flexible and focused on innovation  you are motivated to include your colleagues in new applications  including in non technical areas   Please note  you must be resident in the Netherlands  If you do not live in the Netherlands  we will  You ensure that all data is processed and that Product information is translated into data for processing in the systems  Your main tasks to be in this position are  Maintaining and managing the and changes  Ensures that the information is always complete and clear   otherwise actively takes initiative to make it right  Can support the department with other common administrative activities when necessary  Ensuring that the ELU systems are up to date with newest developments from ECCO Group Master Data Head office team Your Profile To be successful in this position  we are looking for a
